GR14ruphbr_u:11: tasya hareḥ pada-kamalaṃ vande caitanya-devasya || RBhrs_1,1.2 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:17: sphuratu sanātana suciraṃ tava bhakti-rasāmṛtāmbhodhiḥ || RBhrs_1,1.5 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:19: ajñenāpi mayāsya kriyate suhṛdām pramodāya || RBhrs_1,1.6 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:21: catvārah khalu vakṣyante bhāgāḥ pūrvādayaḥ kramāt || RBhrs_1,1.7 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:25: bhāvāśritā tṛtīyā ca turyā prema-nirūpikā || RBhrs_1,1.9 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:26: tatrādau suṣṭhu vaiśiṣṭyam asyāḥ kathayituṃ sphuṭam |
GR14ruphbr_u:27: lakṣaṇaṃ kriyate bhakter uttamāyāḥ satāṃ matam || RBhrs_1,1.10 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:34: ahaituky avyavahitā yā bhaktiḥ puruṣottame || RBhrs_1,1.13 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:36: dīyamānaṃ na gṛhṇanti vinā mat-sevanaṃ janāḥ || RBhrs_1,1.14 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:37: sa eva bhakti-yogākhya ātyantika udāhṛtaḥ || RBhrs_1,1.15 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:43: kleśās tu pāpaṃ tad-bījam avidyā ceti te tridhā || RBhrs_1,1.18 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:45: aprārabdhaṃ bhavet pāpaṃ prārabdhaṃ ceti tad dvidhā || RBhrs_1,1.19 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:53: kutaḥ punas te bhagavan nu darśanāt || RBhrs_1,1.21 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:55: durjāty-ārambhakaṃ pāpaṃ yat syāt prārabdham eva tat || RBhrs_1,1.22 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:66: sroto-gaṇās tam araṇaṃ bhaja vāsudevam || RBhrs_1,1.25 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:69: avidyāṃ nirdahaty āśu dāva-jvāleva pannagīm || RBhrs_1,1.26 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:72: sadguṇāḥ sukham ity-ādīny ākhyātāni manīṣibhiḥ || RBhrs_1,1.27 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:74: yenārcito haris tena tarpitāni jaganty api |
GR14ruphbr_u:75: rajyanti jantavas tatra jangamāḥ sthāvarā api || RBhrs_1,1.28 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:82: sukhaṃ vaiṣayikaṃ brāhmam aiśvaraṃ ceti tat tridhā || RBhrs_1,1.30 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:84: siddhayaḥ paramāścaryā bhuktir muktiś ca śāśvatī |
GR14ruphbr_u:85: nityaṃ ca paramānando bhaved govinda-bhaktitaḥ || RBhrs_1,1.31 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:87: bhūyo 'pi yāce deveśa tvayi bhaktir dṛḍhāstu me |
GR14ruphbr_u:88: yā mokṣānta-caturvarga phaladā sukhadā latā || RBhrs_1,1.32 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:91: puruṣārthās tu catvārās tṛṇāyante samantataḥ || RBhrs_1,1.33 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:94: bhuktyaś cādbhutās tasyāś ceṭikāvad anuvratāḥ || RBhrs_1,1.34 || iti |
GR14ruphbr_u:97: hariṇā cāśvadeyeti dvidhā sā syāt sudurlabhā || RBhrs_1,1.35 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:102: rājan patir gurur alaṃ bhavatāṃ yadūnāṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:103: daivaṃ priyaḥ kula-patiḥ kva ca kiṅkaro vaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:104: astv evam aṅga bhajatāṃ bhagavān mukundo
GR14ruphbr_u:105: muktiṃ dadāti karhicit sma na bhakti-yogam || RBhrs_1,1.37 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:111: sukhāni goṣpadāyante brāhmāṇy api jagad-guro || RBhrs_1,1.39 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:114: kurvanti kṛtinaḥ kecit catur-vargaṃ tṛṇopamam || RBhrs_1,1.40 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:119: na sādhyati mām yogo na sāṅkhyaṃ dharma uddhava |
GR14ruphbr_u:120: na svādhyāyas tapas tyāgo yathā bhaktir mamorjitā || RBhrs_1,1.42 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:127: dviśaḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ padair etan māhātyaṃ parikīrtitam || RBhrs_1,1.44 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:130: yuktis tu kevalā naiva yad asyā apratiṣṭhatā || RBhrs_1,1.45 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:140: sā bhaktiḥ sādhanaṃ bhāvaḥ premā ceti tridhoditā || RBhrs_1,2.1 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:143: nitya-siddhasya bhāvasya prākaṭyaṃ hṛdi sādhyatā || RBhrs_1,2.2 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:144: sā bhaktiḥ saptama-skandhe bhaṅgyā devarṣiṇoditā || RBhrs_1,2.3 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:146: tasmāt kenāpy upāyena manaḥ kṛṣṇe niveśayet || RBhrs_1,2.4 || iti |
GR14ruphbr_u:147: vaidhī rāgānugā ceti sā dvidhā sādhanābhidhā || RBhrs_1,2.5 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:150: śāsanenaiva śāstrasya sā vaidhī bhaktir ucyate || RBhrs_1,2.6 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:152: tasmād bhārata sarvātmā bhagavān īśvaro hariḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:153: śrotavyaḥ kīrtitavyaś ca smartavyaś cecchatābhayam || RBhrs_1,2.7 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:155: smartavyaḥ satataṃ viṣṇur vismartavyo na jātucit |
GR14ruphbr_u:156: sarve vidhi-niṣedhāḥ syur etayor eva kiṅkarāḥ || RBhrs_1,2.8 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:157: ity asau syād vidhir nityaḥ sarva-varṇāśramādiṣu |
GR14ruphbr_u:161: catvāro jajñire varṇā guṇair viprādayaḥ pṛthak || RBhrs_1,2.10 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:162: ya eṣāṃ puruṣaṃ sākṣād ātma-prabhavam īśvaram |
GR14ruphbr_u:163: na bhajanty avajānanti sthānād bhraṣṭāḥ patanty adhaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.11 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:166: arcann ubhyataḥ siddhiṃ matto vindaty abhīpsitām || RBhrs_1,2.12 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:168: surarṣe vihitā śāstre harim uddiśya yā kriyā |
GR14ruphbr_u:169: saiva bhaktir iti proktā tayā bhaktiḥ parā bhavet || RBhrs_1,2.13 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:172: nātisakto na vairāgya-bhāg asyām adhikāry asau || RBhrs_1,2.14 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:175: na nirviṇṇo nātisakto bhakti-yogo 'sya siddhidaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.15 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:176: uttamo madhyamaś ca syāt kaniṣṭhaś ceti sa tridhā || RBhrs_1,2.16 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:178: śāstre yuktau ca nipuṇaḥ sarvathā dṛḍha-niścayaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:179: prauḍha-śraddho 'dhikārī yaḥ sa bhaktāv uttamo mataḥ || RBhrs_1,2.17 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:181: yaḥ śāstrādiṣv anipuṇaḥ śraddhāvān sa tu madhyamaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.18 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:183: yo bhavet komala-śraddhaḥ sa kaniṣṭho nigadyate || RBhrs_1,2.19 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:185: madhye yasmin bhagavatah kṛpā syāt tat-priyasya vā || RBhrs_1,2.20 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:187: yathebhaḥ śaunakādiś ca dhruvaḥ sa ca catuḥsanaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.21 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:189: tāvad bhakti-sukhasyātra katham abhyudayo bhavet || RBhrs_1,2.22 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:190: tatrāpi ca viśeṣeṇa gatim aṇvīm anicchataḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:191: bhaktir hṛta-manaḥ-prāṇān premṇā tān kurute janān || RBhrs_1,2.23 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:196: anicchato me gatim aṇvīṃ prayuṅkte || RBhrs_1,2.24 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:198: eṣāṃ mokṣāya bhaktānāṃ na kadācit spṛhā bhavet || RBhrs_1,2.25 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:211: dīyamānaṃ na gṛhṇanti vinā mat-sevanaṃ janāḥ || RBhrs_1,2.28 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:215: sā brahmaṇi sva-mahimany api nātha mā bhūt
GR14ruphbr_u:216: kiṃ tv antakāsi-lulitāt patatāṃ vimānāt || RBhrs_1,2.29 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:218: na kāmaye nātha tad apy ahaṃ kvacin
GR14ruphbr_u:221: vidhatsva karṇāyutam eṣa me varaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.30 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:237: ye tu necchanty api paraṃ te svārtha-kuśalāḥ smṛtāḥ || RBhrs_1,2.34 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:239: tuṣṭe ca tatra kim alabhyam ananta ādye
GR14ruphbr_u:240: kiṃ tair guṇa-vyatikarād iha ye sva-siddhāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:242: sāraṃ juṣāṃ caraṇayor upagāyatāṃ naḥ || RBhrs_1,2.35 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:244: pratyānītāḥ parama bhavatā trāyatā naḥ sva-bhāgā
GR14ruphbr_u:246: kāla-grastaṃ kiyad idam aho nātha śuśrūṣatāṃ te
GR14ruphbr_u:247: muktis teṣāṃ na hi bahumatā nārasiṃhāparaiḥ kim || RBhrs_1,2.36 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:255: necchanti sevayā pūrṇāḥ kuto 'nyat kāla-viplutam || RBhrs_1,2.38 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:264: na parilaṣanti kecid apavargam apīśvara te
GR14ruphbr_u:267: na kiñcit sādhavo dhīrā bhaktā hy ekāntino mama |
GR14ruphbr_u:268: vāñchanty api mayā dattaṃ kaivalyam apunar-bhavam || RBhrs_1,2.41 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:275: naivecchaty āśiṣaḥ kvāpi brahmarṣir mokṣam apy uta |
GR14ruphbr_u:276: bhaktiṃ parāṃ bhagavati labdhavān puruṣe 'vyaye || RBhrs_1,2.43 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:278: varaṃ deva mokṣaṃ na mokṣāvadhiṃ vā
GR14ruphbr_u:281: sadā me manasy avirāstāṃ kim anyaiḥ || RBhrs_1,2.44 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:285: na mokṣe graho me 'sti dāmodareha || RBhrs_1,2.45 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:287: na dharma kāmam arthaṃ vā mokṣaṃ vā varadeśvara |
GR14ruphbr_u:288: prārthaye tava pādābje dāsyam evābhikāmaye || RBhrs_1,2.46 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:290: punaḥ punar varān ditsur viṣṇur muktiṃ na yācitaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:291: bhaktir eva vṛtā yena prahlādaṃ taṃ namāmy ahaṃ || RBhrs_1,2.47 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:292: yadṛcchayā labdham api viṣṇor dāśarathes tu yaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:293: naicchan mokṣaṃ vinā dāsyaṃ tasmai hanumate namaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.48 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:296: bhavān prabhur ahaṃ dāsa iti yatra vilupyate || RBhrs_1,2.49 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:301: icchāmi hi mahābhāga kāruṇyaṃ tava suvrata || RBhrs_1,2.51 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:304: sudurlabhaḥ praśāntātmā koṭiṣv api mahā-mune || RBhrs_1,2.52 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:307: bhakti-yoga-vidhānārthaṃ kathaṃ paśyema hi striyaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.53 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:309: ātmārāmāś ca munayo nirgranthā apy urukrame |
GR14ruphbr_u:310: kurvanty ahaitukīṃ bhaktim ittham-bhūta-guṇo hariḥ || RBhrs_1,2.54 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:312: sālokyādis tathāpy atra bhaktyā nātivirudhyate || RBhrs_1,2.55 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:314: sālokyādir dvidhā tatra nādyā sevā-juṣaṃ matā || RBhrs_1,2.56 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:316: naivāṅgīkurvate jātu muktiṃ pañca-vidhām api || RBhrs_1,2.57 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:318: yeṣāṃ śrīśa-prasādo 'pi mano hartuṃ na śaknuyāt || RBhrs_1,2.58 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:323: dṛṣtāntitā vaśiṣṭhena hari-bhaktir nṛpaṃ prati || RBhrs_1,2.60 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:325: sarve 'dhikāriṇo hy atra hari-bhaktau yathā nṛpa || RBhrs_1,2.61 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:328: samprāpya vaiṣṇavīṃ dīkṣāṃ dīkṣitā iva sambabhuḥ || RBhrs_1,2.62 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:331: na karmaṇām akaraṇād eṣa bhakty-adhikāriṇām || RBhrs_1,2.63 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:333: iti vaiṣṇava-śāstrāṇāṃ rahasyaṃ tad-vidāṃ matam || RBhrs_1,2.64 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:335: sve sve 'dhikāre yā niṣṭhā sā guṇaḥ parikīrtitaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:336: viparyayas tu doṣaḥ syād ubhayor eṣa niścayaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.65 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:340: yatra kva vābhadram abhūd amuṣya kiṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:343: ājñāyaiva guṇān doṣān mayādiṣṭān api svakān |
GR14ruphbr_u:344: dharmān santyajya yaḥ sarvān māṃ bhajet sa ca sattamaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.67 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:347: na kiṅkaro nāyam ṛṇī ca rājan |
GR14ruphbr_u:351: sarva-dharman parityājya mām ekaṃ śaraṇaṃ vraja |
GR14ruphbr_u:352: ahaṃ tvāṃ sarva-pāpebhyo mokṣayiṣyāmi mā sucaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.69 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:355: tathā na spṛśato rāmopāsakaṃ vidhi-pūrvakam || RBhrs_1,2.70 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:362: kintu tāni prasiddhāni nirdiśyante yathāmati || RBhrs_1,2.72 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:365: ekaṃ karmātra vidvadbhir ekaṃ bhakty-aṅgam ucyate || RBhrs_1,2.73 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:370: nivāso dvārakādau ca gaṅgāder api sannidhau || RBhrs_1,2.75 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:373: eṣām atra daśāṅgānāṃ bhavet prārambha-rupatā || RBhrs_1,2.77 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:385: nirmālyādeś ca tasyāgre tāṇḍavaṃ daṇḍavan-natiḥ || RBhrs_1,2.84 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:387: arcanaṃ paricaryā ca gītaṃ saṅkīrtanaṃ japaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.85 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:391: smṛtir dhyānaṃ tathā dāsyaṃ sakhyam ātma-nivedanam || RBhrs_1,2.87 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:393: sarvathā śaraṇāpattis tadīyānāṃ ca sevanam || RBhrs_1,2.88 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:397: śraddhā viśeṣataḥ prītiḥ śrī-mūrter aṅghri-sevane || RBhrs_1,2.90 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:399: sajātīyāśaye snigdhe sādhau saṅgaḥ svato vare || RBhrs_1,2.91 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:402: nikhila-śraiṣṭhya-bodhāya punar apy atra kīrtanam || RBhrs_1,2.93 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:407: tasmād guruṃ prapadyeta jijñāsuḥ śreya uttamam |
GR14ruphbr_u:408: śābde pare ca niṣṇātaṃ brahmaṇy upaśamāśrayam || RBhrs_1,2.97 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:411: amāyayānuvṛttyā yais tuṣyed ātmātma-do hariḥ || RBhrs_1,2.98 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:416: sa mṛgyaḥ śreyasāṃ hetuḥ panthāḥ santāpa-varjitaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:417: anvāpta-śramaṃ pūrve yena santaḥ pratasthire || RBhrs_1,2.100 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:420: aikāntikī harer bhaktir utpātāyaiva kalpate || RBhrs_1,2.101 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:422: vastutas tu tathā naiva yad aśāstrīyatekṣyate || RBhrs_1,2.102 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:424: acirād eva sarvārthaḥ sidhyaty eṣām abhīpsitaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:427: harim uddiśya bhogāni kāle tyaktavatas tava |
GR14ruphbr_u:430: saṃvatsaraṃ vā ṣaṇmāsān māsaṃ māsārdham eva vā |
GR14ruphbr_u:431: dvārakā-vāsinaḥ sarve narā nāryaś caturbhujāḥ || RBhrs_1,2.105 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:434: diviṣṭhā yatra paśyanti sarvān eva caturbhujān || RBhrs_1,2.106 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:439: kas tāṃ na seveta mariṣyamāṇaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.107 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:441: yāvatā syāt sva-nirvāhaḥ svīkuryāt tāvad artha-vit |
GR14ruphbr_u:442: ādhikye nyūnatāyāṃ ca cyavate paramārthataḥ || RBhrs_1,2.108 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:448: pūjitāḥ praṇatāḥ dhyātāḥ kṣapayanti nṝṇām agham || RBhrs_1,2.110 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:456: na śiṣyān anubadhnīta granthān naivābhyased bahūn |
GR14ruphbr_u:457: na vyākhyām upayuñjīta nārambhān ārabhet kvacit || RBhrs_1,2.113 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:460: aviklava-matir bhūtvā harim eva dhiyā smaret || RBhrs_1,2.114 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:463: kathaṃ tatra mukundasya sphūrti-sambhāvanā bhavet || RBhrs_1,2.115 |||
GR14ruphbr_u:468: piteva putraṃ karuṇo nodvejayati yo janam |
GR14ruphbr_u:469: viśuddhasya hṛṣīkeśas tūrṇaṃ tasya prasīdati || RBhrs_1,2.117 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:472: vaiṣṇavena sadā te tu varjanīyāḥ prayatnataḥ || RBhrs_1,2.118 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:475: harer apy aparādhān yaḥ kuryād dvipadapāṃśulaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.119 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:476: nāmāśrayaḥ kadācit syāt taraty eva sa nāmataḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:477: nāmno hi sarva-suhṛdo hy aparādhāt pataty adhaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.120 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:479: nindāṃ bhagavataḥ śrṇvaṃs tat-parasya janasya vā |
GR14ruphbr_u:480: tato nāpaiti yaḥ so 'pi yāty adhaḥ sukṛtāc cyutaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.121 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:485: te vaiṣṇavā bhuvanam āśu pavitrayanti || RBhrs_1,2.122 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:491: sa loka-pāvano bhutvā tasya lokam avāpnuyāt || RBhrs_1,2.124 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:494: ucchiṣṭa-bhojino dāsās tava māyāṃ jayemahi || RBhrs_1,2.125 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:496: kṛṣṇottīrṇaṃ tu nirmālyaṃ yasyāṅgaṃ spṛśate mune |
GR14ruphbr_u:497: sarva-rogais tathā pāpair mukto bhavati nārada || RBhrs_1,2.126 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:499: yo nṛtyati prahṛṣṭātmā bhāvair bahuṣu bhaktitaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:500: sa nirdahati pāpāni manvantara-śateṣv api || RBhrs_1,2.127 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:510: yān ārūḍhaṃ puraḥ prekṣya samāyāntaṃ janārdanam |
GR14ruphbr_u:511: abhyutthānaṃ naraḥ kurvan pātayet sarva-kilbiṣam || RBhrs_1,2.130 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:514: viṣṇunaiva samāḥ sarve bhavanti śvapadādayaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.131 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:516: sthānaṃ tīrthaṃ gṛhaṃ cāsya tatra tīrthe gatir yathā || RBhrs_1,2.132 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:519: slāghyau tāv eva caraṇau yau hares tīrtha-gāminau || RBhrs_1,2.133 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:522: na bhūyaḥ praviśen mātuḥ kukṣi-kārāgṛhaṃ sudhīḥ || RBhrs_1,2.134 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:525: tad evāvartanaṃ tasya punar nāvartate bhave || RBhrs_1,2.135 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:527: catur-vāraṃ bhramībhis tu jagat sarvaṃ carācaram |
GR14ruphbr_u:534: sarvāsām api siddhīnāṃ mūlaṃ tāc-caraṇārcanaṃ || RBhrs_1,2.138 ||

GR14ruphbr_u:961: premaiva gopa-rāmāṇāṃ kāma ity agamat prathām || RBhrs_1,2.285 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:962: ity uddhavādayo 'py etaṃ vāñchati bhagavat-priyāḥ || RBhrs_1,2.286 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:963: kāma-prāyā ratiḥ kintu kubjāyām eva sammatā || RBhrs_1,2.287 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:970: rāgātmikāyā dvaividhyād dvidhā rāgānugā ca sā |
GR14ruphbr_u:971: kāmānugā ca sambandhānugā ceti nigadyate || RBhrs_1,2.290 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:974: teṣāṃ bhāvāptaye lubdho bhaved atrādhikāravān || RBhrs_1,2.291 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:976: nātra śāstraṃ na yuktiṃ ca tal-lobhotpatti-lakṣaṇam || RBhrs_1,2.292 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:978: atra śāstraṃ tathā tarkam anukūlam apekṣate || RBhrs_1,2.293 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:979: kṛṣṇaṃ smaran janaṃ cāsya preṣṭhaṃ nija-samīhitam |
GR14ruphbr_u:980: tat-tat-kathā-rataś cāsau kuryād vāsaṃ vraje sadā || RBhrs_1,2.294 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:984: yāny aṅgāni ca tāny atra vijñeyāni manīṣibhiḥ || RBhrs_1,2.296 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:990: śrī-mūrter mādhurīṃ prekṣya tat-tal-līlāṃ niśamya vā |
GR14ruphbr_u:992: purāṇe śruyate pādme puṃsam api bhaved iyam || RBhrs_1,2.300 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:995: dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ hariṃ tatra bhoktum aicchan suvigraham || RBhrs_1,2.301 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:996: te sarve strītvam āpannāḥ samudbhūtāś ca gokule |
GR14ruphbr_u:997: hariṃ samprāpya kāmena tato muktā bhavārṇavāt || RBhrs_1,2.302 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:998: riraṃsāṃ suṣṭhu kurvan yo vidhi-mārgeṇa sevate |
GR14ruphbr_u:999: kevalenaiva sa tadā mahiṣītvam iyāt pure || RBhrs_1,2.303 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1002: bhartāraṃ ca jagad-yoniṃ vāsudevam ajaṃ vibhum || RBhrs_1,2.304 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1004: sā sambandhānugā bhaktiḥ procyate sadbhir ātmani |
GR14ruphbr_u:1008: tathā hi śruyate śāstre kaścit kurupurī-sthitaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:1013: ye dhyāyanti sadodyuktās tebhyo 'pīha namo namaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.308 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1022: rucibhiś citta-māsṛṇya-kṛd asau bhāva ucyate || RBhrs_1,3.1 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1024: premṇas tu prathamāvasthā bhāva ity abhidhīyate |
GR14ruphbr_u:1031: vastutaḥ svayam āsvāda-svarūpaiva ratis tv asau |
GR14ruphbr_u:1035: ādyas tu prāyikas tatra dvitīyo viralodayaḥ || RBhrs_1,3.6 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1040: harāv āsaktim utpādya ratiṃ saṃjanayaty asau || RBhrs_1,3.8 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1045: priya-śravasy aṅga mamābhavad ratiḥ || RBhrs_1,3.9 || iti |
GR14ruphbr_u:1046: ratyā tu bhāva evātra na tu premābhidhīyate |
GR14ruphbr_u:1047: mama bhaktiḥ pravṛtteti vakṣyate sa yad agrataḥ || RBhrs_1,3.10 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1058: purāṇe nātya-śāstre ca dvayos tu rati-bhāvayoḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:1059: samānārthatayā hy atra dvayam aikyena lakṣitam || RBhrs_1,3.13 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1061: itthaṃ manorathaṃ bālā kurvatī nṛtya utsukā |
GR14ruphbr_u:1062: hari-prītyā ca tāṃ sarvāṃ rātrim evātyavāhayat || RBhrs_1,3.14 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1070: dvijendra tava mayy astu bhaktir avyābhicāriṇī || RBhrs_1,3.17 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1075: prasāda āntaro yaḥ syāt sa hārda iti kathyate || RBhrs_1,3.19 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1080: guṇair alam asaṅkhyeyair mahātmyaṃ tasya sūcyate |
GR14ruphbr_u:1081: vāsudeve bhagavati yasya naisargikī ratiḥ || RBhrs_1,3.21 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1083: nisargaḥ saiva tenātra ratir naisargikī matā || RBhrs_1,3.22 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1085: aho dhanyo 'si devarṣe kṛpayā yasya tat-kṣaṇāt |
GR14ruphbr_u:1086: nīco 'py utpulako lebhe lubdhako ratim acyute || RBhrs_1,3.23 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1087: bhaktānāṃ bhedataḥ seyaṃ ratiḥ pañca-vidhā matā |
GR14ruphbr_u:1088: agre vivicya vaktavyā tena nātra prapañcyate || RBhrs_1,3.24 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1090: āśā-bandhaḥ samutkaṇṭhā nāma-gāne sadā ruciḥ || RBhrs_1,3.25 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1092: ity ādayo 'nubhāvāḥ syur jāta-bhāvāṅkure jane || RBhrs_1,3.26 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1094: kṣobha-hetāv api prāpte kṣāntir akṣubhitātmatā || RBhrs_1,3.27 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1106: viraktir indriyārthānāṃ syād arocakatā svayaṃ || RBhrs_1,3.30 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1108: yo dustyajān dāra-sutān suhṛd rājyaṃ hṛdi-spṛśaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:1113: harau ratiṃ vahann eṣa narendrāṇāṃ śikhā-maṇiḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:1114: bhikṣām aṭann ari-pure śvapākam api vandate || RBhrs_1,3.33 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1118: na premā śravaṇādi-bhaktir api vā yogo 'thavā vaiṣṇavo
GR14ruphbr_u:1119: jñānaṃ vā śubha-karma vā kiyad aho saj-jātir apy asti vā |
GR14ruphbr_u:1121: he gopī-jana-vallabha vyathayate hā hā mad-āśaiva mām || RBhrs_1,3.35 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1126: ālolām anurāgiṇor nayanayor ārdrāṃ mṛdau jalpite |
GR14ruphbr_u:1128: āśāste mama locanaṃ vraja-śiśor-mūrtiṃ jagan-mohinīm || RBhrs_1,3.37 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1131: tava madhura-svara-kaṇṭhī gāyati nāmāvalīṃ bālā || RBhrs_1,3.38 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1136: ceto bata harati hanta kiṃ kurmaḥ || RBhrs_1,3.39 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1137: tad vasati-sthale prītiḥ, yathā padyāvalyām {*Not found in my edition.}--
GR14ruphbr_u:1141: ānandāśru-dharaḥ kadā madhu-purīṃ dhanyaś cariṣyāmy aham || RBhrs_1,3.40 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1144: mumukṣu-prabhṛtīnāṃ ced bhaved eṣā ratir na hi || RBhrs_1,3.41 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1146: yā kṛṣṇenātigopyāśu bhajadbhyo 'pi na dīyate || RBhrs_1,3.42 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1148: hṛdaye sambhavaty eṣāṃ kathaṃ bhāgavatī ratiḥ || RBhrs_1,3.43 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1151: pratibimbas tathā cchāyā raty-ābhāso dvidhā mataḥ || RBhrs_1,3.45 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1161: rateś chāyā bhavet kiṃcit tat-sādṛśyāvalambinī || RBhrs_1,3.49 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1163: apy ānuṣaṅgikād eṣa kvacid ajñeṣv apīkṣyate || RBhrs_1,3.50 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1164: kintu bhāgyaṃ vinā nāsau bhāva-cchāyāpy udañcati |
GR14ruphbr_u:1165: yad abhyudayataḥ kṣemaṃ tatra syād uttarottaram || RBhrs_1,3.51 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1169: krameṇa kṣayam āpnoti kha-sthaḥ pūrṇa-śaśī yathā || RBhrs_1,3.53 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1172: ābhāsatāṃ ca śanakair nyūna-jātīyatām api || RBhrs_1,3.54 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1174: ābhāsatām asau kiṃ vā bhajanīyeśa-bhāvatām || RBhrs_1,3.55 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1175: ata eva kvacit teṣu navya-bhakteṣu dṛśyate |
GR14ruphbr_u:1177: sādhanekṣāṃ vinā yasminn akasmād bhāva īkṣyate |
GR14ruphbr_u:1180: yaḥ prathīyān bhaved bhāvaḥ sa tu kṛṣṇa-prasādajaḥ || RBhrs_1,3.58 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1181: jane cej jāta-bhāve 'pi vaiguṇyam iva dṛśyate |
GR14ruphbr_u:1182: kāryā tathāpi nāsūyā kṛtārthaḥ sarvathaiva saḥ || RBhrs_1,3.59 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1189: uṣmāṇam api vamantī sudhāṃśu-koṭer api svādvī || RBhrs_1,3.61 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1196: bhāvaḥ sa eva sāndrātmā budhaiḥ premā nigadyate || RBhrs_1,4.1 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1200: bhaktiḥ premocyate bhīṣma-mukhyair yatra tu saṅgatā |
GR14ruphbr_u:1202: bhāvottho 'ti-prasādotthaḥ śrī-harer iti sa dvidhā || RBhrs_1,4.4 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1212: na patiṃ kāmayet kañcid brahmacarya-sthitā sadā |
GR14ruphbr_u:1221: māhātmya-jñāna-yuktaś ca kevalaś ceti sa dvidhā || RBhrs_1,4.11 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1224: sneho bhaktir iti proktas tayā sārṣṭyādinānyathā || RBhrs_1,4.12 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1229: rāgānugāśritānāṃ tu prāyaśaḥ kevalo bhavet || RBhrs_1,4.14 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1231: tato 'nartha-nivṛttiḥ syāt tato niṣṭhā rucis tataḥ || RBhrs_1,4.15 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1233: sādhakānām ayaṃ premnaḥ prādurbhāve bhavet kramaḥ || RBhrs_1,4.16 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1235: antarvāṇībhir apy asya mudrā suṣṭhu sudurgamā || RBhrs_1,4.17 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1237: bhāvonmatto hareḥ kiñcin na veda sukham ātmanaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:1238: dukhaṃ ceti maheśāni paramānanda āplutaḥ || RBhrs_1,4.18 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1239: premṇa eva vilāsatvād vairalyāt sādhakeṣv api |
GR14ruphbr_u:1240: atra snehādayo bhedā vivicya na hi śaṃsitāḥ || RBhrs_1,4.19 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1258: agha-damano mathurāyāṃ sadā sanātana-tanur jayati || RBhrs_2,1.1 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1261: asya pañca laharyaḥ syur vibhāvākhyāgrimā matā |
GR14ruphbr_u:1263: vyabhicāry-abhidhā turyā sthāyi-saṃjñā ca pañcamī || RBhrs_2,1.3 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1268: eṣā kṛṣṇa-ratiḥ sthāyī bhāvo bhakti-raso bhavet || RBhrs_2,1.5 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1270: eṣa bhakti-rasāsvādas tasyaiva hṛdi jāyate || RBhrs_2,1.6 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1276: ratir ānanda-rūpaiva nīyamānā tu rasyatām || RBhrs_2,1.9 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1279: kintu premā vibhāvādyaiḥ svalpair nīto 'py aṇīyasīm |
GR14ruphbr_u:1280: vibhāvanādy-avasthāṃ tu sadya āsvādyatāṃ vrajet || RBhrs_2,1.11 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1283: kārya-bhūtāḥ smitādyāś ca tathāṣṭau stabdhatādayaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.12 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1284: nirvedādyāḥ sahāyāś ca te jñeyā rasa-bhāvane |
GR14ruphbr_u:1285: vibhāvā anubhāvāś ca sāttvikā vyabhicāriṇaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.13 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1288: te dvidhālambanā eke tathaivoddīpanāḥ pare || RBhrs_2,1.14 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1290: vibhāvyate hi raty-ādir yatra yena vibhāvyate |
GR14ruphbr_u:1293: kṛṣṇaś ca kṛṣṇa-bhaktāś ca budhair ālambanā matāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:1296: nāyakānāṃ śiro-ratnaṃ kṛṣṇas tu bhagavān svayam |
GR14ruphbr_u:1300: hanta me katham udeti sa-vatse, vatsa-pāla-paṭale ratir atra |
GR14ruphbr_u:1301: ity aniścita-matir baladevo, vismaya-stimita-mūrtir ivāsīt || RBhrs_2,1.18 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1303: āvṛtaṃ prakaṭaṃ ceti svarūpaṃ kathitaṃ dvidhā || RBhrs_2,1.19 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1307: māṃ snehayati kim uccair, mahileyaṃ dvārakāvarodhe 'tra |
GR14ruphbr_u:1308: āṃ viditaṃ kutukārthī, vanitā-veśo hariś carati || RBhrs_2,1.21 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1313: karoty uccair modaṃ mama madhura-mūrtir madhuripuḥ || RBhrs_2,1.22 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1316: ruciras tejasā yukto balīyān vayasānvitaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.23 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1321: sthiro dāntaḥ kṣamā-śīlo gambhīro dhṛtimān samaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:1322: vadānyo dhārmikaḥ śūraḥ karuṇo mānya-mānakṛt || RBhrs_2,1.26 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1328: samudrā iva pañcāśad durvigāhā harer amī || RBhrs_2,1.29 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1331: tathā hi pādme pārvatyai śiti-kaṇṭhena tad-guṇāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:1333: eta eva guṇāḥ prāyo dharmāya vana-mālinaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:1336: satyaṃ śaucaṃ dayā kṣāntis tyāgaḥ santoṣa ārjavam |
GR14ruphbr_u:1337: śamo damas tapaḥ sāmyaṃ titikṣoparatiḥ śrutam || RBhrs_2,1.33 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1338: jñānaṃ viraktir aiśvaryaṃ śauryaṃ tejo balaṃ smṛtiḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:1339: svātantryaṃ kauśalaṃ kāntir dhairyaṃ mārdavam eva ca || RBhrs_2,1.34 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1340: prāgalbhyaṃ praśrayaḥ śīlaṃ saha ojo balaṃ bhagaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:1341: gāmbhīryaṃ sthairyam āstikyaṃ kīrtir māno 'nahaṅkṛtiḥ || RBhrs_2,1.35 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1342: ime cānye ca bhagavan nityā yatra mahā-guṇāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:1343: prārthyā mahattvam icchadbhir na viyanti sma karhicit || RBhrs_2,1.36 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1344: atha pañca-guṇā ye syur aṃśena giriśādiṣu || RBhrs_2,1.37 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1356: ity asādhāraṇaṃ proktaṃ govindasya catuṣṭayam || RBhrs_2,1.43 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1358: sodāharaṇam eteṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kriyate kramāt || RBhrs_2,1.44 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1360: ślāghyāṅga-sanniveśo yaḥ suramyāṅgaḥ sa kathyate || RBhrs_2,1.45 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1365: parikṣāmo madhyaḥ sphurati murahantur madhurimā || RBhrs_2,1.46 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1367: tanau guṇottham aṅkottham iti sal-lakṣaṇaṃ dvidhā || RBhrs_2,1.47 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1369: guṇotthaṃ syād guṇair yogo raktatā-tuṅgatādibhiḥ || RBhrs_2,1.48 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1371: rāgaḥ saptasu hanta ṣaṭsv api śiśor aṅgeṣv alaṃ tuṅgatā
GR14ruphbr_u:1372: visāras triṣu kharvatā triṣu tathā gambhīratā ca triṣu |
GR14ruphbr_u:1373: dairghyaṃ pañcasu kiṃ ca pañcasu sakhe samprekṣyate sūkṣmatā
GR14ruphbr_u:1374: dvātriṃśad-vara-lakṣaṇaḥ katham asau gopeṣu sambhāvyate || RBhrs_2,1.49 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1376: rekhāmayaṃ rathāṅgādi syād aṅkotthaṃ karādiṣu || RBhrs_2,1.50 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1395: tejo dhāma prabhāvaś cety ucyate dvividhaṃ budhaiḥ || RBhrs_2,1.55 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1400: hari-vakṣasi ruci-niviḍe maṇirāḍ ayam uḍur iva sphurati || RBhrs_2,1.57 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1409: prāṇena mahatā pūrṇo balīyān iti kathyate || RBhrs_2,1.60 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1416: vāmas tāmarasākṣasya bhuja-daṇḍaḥ sa pātu vaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:1417: krīḍā-kandukatāṃ yena nīto govardhano giriḥ || RBhrs_2,1.62 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1425: murārer mādhuryaṃ manasi madirākṣīr madayati || RBhrs_2,1.64 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1427: vividhādbhuta-bhāṣāvit sa prokto yas tu kovidaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:1428: nānā-deśyāsu bhāṣāsu saṃskṛte prākṛteṣu ca || RBhrs_2,1.65 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1435: syān nānṛtaṃ vaco yasya satya-vākyaḥ sa kathyate || RBhrs_2,1.67 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1438: raṇorvaritam ity abhūt tava yathārtham evoditam |
GR14ruphbr_u:1439: ravir bhavati śītalaḥ kumuda-bandhur apy uṣṇalas
GR14ruphbr_u:1440: tathāpi na murāntaka vyabhicariṣṇur uktis tava || RBhrs_2,1.68 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1445: māṃ viddhi kṛṣṇaṃ bhavataḥ sapatnam || RBhrs_2,1.69 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1455: iti dvidhā nigadito vāvadūko manīṣibhiḥ || RBhrs_2,1.72 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1465: hari-vāg iyaṃ mama dhinoti dhiyaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.74 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1467: vidvān nītijña ity eṣa supaṇḍityo dvidhā mataḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:1468: vidvān akhila-vidyā-vin nītijñas tu yathārha-kṛt || RBhrs_2,1.75 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1477: tvāṃ labdhāvasarā cirād gurukule prekṣya svasaṅgārthinaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:1478: vidyā nāma vadhūś caturdaśa-guṇā govinda śuśrūyate || RBhrs_2,1.77 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1483: śāsti svasti-dhurandharo madhupurīṃ nītyā madhūnāṃ patiḥ || RBhrs_2,1.78 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1485: medhāvī sūkṣmadhīś ceti procyate buddhimān dvidhā || RBhrs_2,1.79 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1488: guror jagati darśayan samayam atra vidyārthinām |
GR14ruphbr_u:1490: dadhau hṛdaya-mandire kim api citravan mādhavaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.80 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1492: yadubhir ayam avadhyo mleccha-rājas tad enaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:1495: jhara-muci mucukundaḥ kandare yatra śete || RBhrs_2,1.81 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1499: vāsaḥ samprati keśava kva bhavato mugdhekṣaṇe nanv idaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:1501: yāminyām uṣitaḥ kva dhūrta vitanur muṣṇāti kiṃ yāminī
GR14ruphbr_u:1502: śaurir gopa-vadhūṃ chalaiḥ parihasann evaṃ-vidhaiḥ pātu vaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.83 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:1506: gītaṃ gumphati tāṇḍavaṃ ghaṭayati brūte prahelī-kramaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:1507: veṇuṃ vādayate srajaṃ viracayaty ālekhyam abhyasyati |
GR14ruphbr_u:1508: nirmāti svayam indrajāla-paṭalīṃ dyūte jayaty unmadān

GR14ruphbr_u:2138: mallānām aśanir nṝṇāṃ naravaraḥ strīṇāṃ smaro mūrtimān
GR14ruphbr_u:2139: gopānāṃ svajano 'satāṃ kṣitirbhujāṃ śāstā sva-pitroḥ śiśuḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:2140: mṛtyur bhoja-pater virāḍ aviduṣāṃ tattvaṃ paraṃ yogināṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:2141: vṛṣṇīnāṃ paradevateti vidito raṅgaḥ gataḥ sāgrajaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.264 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2143: tejo budhair avajñāder asahiṣṇutvam ucyate || RBhrs_2,1.265 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2146: nande cānakadundubhau ca purataḥ kaṃsena viśva-druhā |
GR14ruphbr_u:2148: mañcasyopari sañcukurdiṣur asau paśyācyutaḥ prāñcati || RBhrs_2,1.266 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2150: śṛṅgāra-pracurā ceṣṭā yatra taṃ lalitaṃ viduḥ || RBhrs_2,1.267 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2154: ariṣṭe sāṭopaṃ kaṭu ruvati savyena vihasann
GR14ruphbr_u:2155: udañcad-romāñcaṃ racayati ca kṛṣṇaḥ parikaram || RBhrs_2,1.268 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2159: vadānyaḥ ko bhaved atra vadānyaḥ puruṣottamāt |
GR14ruphbr_u:2161: sāmānyā nāyaka-guṇāḥ sthiratādyā yad apy amī |
GR14ruphbr_u:2162: tathāpi pūrvataḥ kiñcid viśeṣāt punar īritāḥ || RBhrs_2,1.271 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2165: uddhavādyās tathā mantre sahāyāḥ parikīrtitāḥ || RBhrs_2,1.272 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2168: yo satya-vākya ity ādyā hrīmān ity antimā guṇāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:2169: proktāḥ kṛṣṇe 'sya bhakteṣu te vijñeyā manīṣibhiḥ || RBhrs_2,1.274 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2170: te sādhakāś ca siddhāś ca dvi-vidhāḥ parikīrtitāḥ || RBhrs_2,1.275 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2176: prema-maitrī-kṛpopekṣā yaḥ karoti sa madhyamaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.277 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2179: tiṣṭhaty eva bhavāgni-hetir iti te dhīmann alaṃ cintayā |
GR14ruphbr_u:2182: bilvamaṅgala-tulyā ye sādhakās te prakīrtitāḥ || RBhrs_2,1.279 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2186: samprāpta-siddhayaḥ siddhā nitya-siddhāś ca te tridhā || RBhrs_2,1.281 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2188: sādhanaiḥ kṛpayā cāsya dvidhā samprāpta-siddhayaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.282 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2191: dūre yamā hy upari naḥ spṛhaṇīya-śīlāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:2198: nirdhautāsya-taṭān muhuḥ pulakino dhanyān namaskurmahe || RBhrs_2,1.284 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2201: nāsāṃ dvijāti-saṃskāro na nivāso gurāv api |
GR14ruphbr_u:2202: na tapo nātma-mīmāṃsā na śaucaṃ na kriyāḥ śubhāḥ || RBhrs_2,1.286 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2204: bhaktir dṛḍhā na cāsmākaṃ saṃskārādimatām api || RBhrs_2,1.287 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2207: na sādhana-vidhau ca te śrama-lavasya gandho 'py abhūt |
GR14ruphbr_u:2216: āgato 'haṃ gaṇāḥ sarve jātās te 'pi mayā saha || RBhrs_2,1.291 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2217: ete hi yādavāḥ sarve mad-gaṇā eva bhāmini |
GR14ruphbr_u:2221: yan-mitraṃ paramānandaṃ pūrṇaṃ brahma sanātanam || RBhrs_2,1.293 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2224: nanda te tanaye 'smāsu tasyāpy autpattikaḥ katham || RBhrs_2,1.294 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2225: sanātanaṃ mitram iti tasyāpy autpattikaḥ katham |
GR14ruphbr_u:2226: sneho 'smāsv iti caiteṣāṃ nitya-preṣṭhatvam āgatam || RBhrs_2,1.295 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2228: eṣāṃ laukikavac-ceṣṭā līlā mura-ripor iva || RBhrs_2,1.296 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2231: tathā tenaiva jāyante nija-lokād yadṛcchayā || RBhrs_2,1.297 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2232: punas tenaiva gacchanti tat-padaṃ śāśvataṃ param |
GR14ruphbr_u:2233: na karma-bandhanaṃ janma vaiṣṇavānāṃ ca vidyate || RBhrs_2,1.298 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2234: ye proktāḥ pañca-pañcāśat kramāt kaṃsaripor guṇāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:2235: te cānye cāpi siddheṣu siddhidatvādayo matāḥ || RBhrs_2,1.299 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2236: bhaktās tu kīrtitāḥ śāntās tathā dāsa-sutādayaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:2237: sakhāyo guru-vargāś ca preyasyaś ceti pañcadhā || RBhrs_2,1.300 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2239: uddīpanās tu te proktā bhāvam uddīpayanti ye |
GR14ruphbr_u:2240: te tu śrī-kṛṣṇa-candrasya guṇāś ceṣṭāḥ prasādhanam || RBhrs_2,1.301 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2244: guṇās tu trividhāḥ proktāḥ kāya-vāṅ-mānasāśrayāḥ || RBhrs_2,1.303 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2247: guṇāḥ svarūpam evāsya kāyikādyā yadapy amī |
GR14ruphbr_u:2248: bhedaṃ svīkṛtya varṇyante tathāpy uddīpanā iti || RBhrs_2,1.305 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2249: atas tasya svarūpasya syād ālambanataiva hi |
GR14ruphbr_u:2250: uddīpanatvam eva syād bhūṣaṇādes tu kevalam || RBhrs_2,1.306 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2251: eṣām ālambanatvaṃ ca tathoddīpanatāpi ca || RBhrs_2,1.307 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2253: vayaḥ kaumāra-paugaṇḍa-kaiśoram iti tat tridhā || RBhrs_2,1.308 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2255: ā-ṣoḍaśāc ca kaiśoraṃ yauvanaṃ syāt tataḥ param || RBhrs_2,1.309 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2256: aucityāt tatra kaumāraṃ vaktavyaṃ vatsale rase |
GR14ruphbr_u:2258: śraiṣṭhyam ujjvala evāsya kaiśorasya tathāpy adaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:2260: ādyaṃ madhyaṃ tathā śeṣaṃ kaiśoraṃ trividhaṃ bhavet || RBhrs_2,1.312 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2266: praviśati dṛśor ante kāntir manāg iva lohinī |
GR14ruphbr_u:2267: sakhi tanu- ruhāṃ rājiḥ sūkṣmā darāsya virohate
GR14ruphbr_u:2268: sphurati suṣamā navyedānīṃ tanau vana-mālinaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.314 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2277: radānāṃ rañjanaṃ rāga-cūrṇair ity ādi ceṣṭitam || RBhrs_2,1.317 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2280: śarālir iva śāṇitā nakhara-rājir agre kharā |
GR14ruphbr_u:2282: na kā sakhi samīkṣaṇād yuvatir asya vitrasyati || RBhrs_2,1.318 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2284: kartuṃ mugdhāḥ svayam acaṭunā na kṣamante 'bhiyogaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:2285: na vyādātuṃ kvacid api jane vaktram apy utsahante |
GR14ruphbr_u:2287: sva-prāṇebhyas trayam udasṛjann adya toyāñjalīnām || RBhrs_2,1.319 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2289: ūru-dvayasya bāhvoś ca kāpi śrīr urasas tathā |
GR14ruphbr_u:2290: mūrter mādhurimādyaṃ ca kaiśore sati madhyame || RBhrs_2,1.320 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2297: tri-jagan-mohanaṃ gītam ity ādir iha mādhurī || RBhrs_2,1.322 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2302: hares taruṇimāṅkure sphurati mādhurī kāpy abhūt || RBhrs_2,1.323 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2309: govindasya vilāsa-vṛndam adhikaṃ vṛndāṭavī śaṃsati || RBhrs_2,1.325 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2313: kathaṃ hā nas trāṇaṃ sakhi mukulayan bodha-kumudaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:2317: tri-vali-vyaktir ity ādyaṃ kaiśore carame sati || RBhrs_2,1.327 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2328: idam eva hareḥ prājñair nava-yauvanam ucyate || RBhrs_2,1.330 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2332: kāntābhiḥ kalahāyate kvacid ayaṃ kandarpa-lekhān kvacit
GR14ruphbr_u:2335: sandhiṃ kvāpy anuśāsti kuñja-nṛpatiḥ śṛṅgāra-rājyottamam || RBhrs_2,1.332 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2340: kaiśoreṇa tavādya kṛṣṇa guruṇā gaurī-gaṇaḥ paṭhyate || RBhrs_2,1.333 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2342: netuḥ svarūpam evoktaṃ kaiśoram iha yadyapi |
GR14ruphbr_u:2345: tan nātirasa-vāhitvān na rasajñair udāhṛtam || RBhrs_2,1.335 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2347: bhavet saundaryam aṅgānāṃ sanniveśo yathocitam || RBhrs_2,1.336 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2352: na kasyāḥ kaṃsāre harati hṛdayaṃ paṅkaja-dṛśaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.337 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2354: vibhūṣaṇaṃ vibhūṣyaṃ syād yena tad rūpam ucyate || RBhrs_2,1.338 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2358: śaktā babhūva na manāg api tad-vidhāne
GR14ruphbr_u:2359: sā pratyuta svayam analpam alaṅkṛtāsīt || RBhrs_2,1.339 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2364: api nava-pallava-saṅgād aṅgāny aparajya śīryanti || RBhrs_2,1.341 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2366: guṇāḥ proktānta evātra jñeyā uddīpanā budhaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.342 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2368: ceṣṭā rāsādi-līlāḥ syus tathā duṣṭa-vadhādayaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.343 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2373: rāsārambha-rasārthino madhurimā cetāṃsi naḥ karṣati || RBhrs_2,1.344 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2376: mlānaḥ salīlam api yatra śiro dhunāne |
GR14ruphbr_u:2378: taṃ duṣṭa-puṅgavam asau harir unmamātha || RBhrs_2,1.345 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2383: yugaṃ catuṣkaṃ bhūyiṣṭhaṃ vasanaṃ tri-vidhaṃ hareḥ || RBhrs_2,1.347 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2389: priyam iva kila varṇaṃ rāga-yuktaṃ priyāyāḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:2396: uṣṇīṣaṃ dadhad aruṇaṃ dhaṭīṃ ca citrāḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:2397: kaṃsārir vahati mahotsave mudaṃ naḥ || RBhrs_2,1.351 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2400: aneka-varṇaṃ vasanaṃ bhūyiṣṭhaṃ kathitaṃ budhaiḥ || RBhrs_2,1.352 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2405: karoti karabhoru me ghana-rucir mudaṃ mādhavaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.353 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2409: syāj jūṭaḥ kavarī cūḍā veṇī ca kaca-bandhanam |
GR14ruphbr_u:2410: pāṇḍuraḥ karburaḥ pīta ity ālepas tridhā mataḥ || RBhrs_2,1.355 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2414: tathā viśeṣako 'pi syād anyad ūhyaṃ svayaṃ budhaiḥ || RBhrs_2,1.357 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2419: śyāmāṅga-dyutir adya me sakhi dṛśor dugdhe mudaṃ mādhavaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.358 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2424: kāñcī citrā mukuṭam atulaṃ kuṇḍale hāri-hīre
GR14ruphbr_u:2425: hāras tāro valayam amalaṃ candrā-cāruś catuṣkī |
GR14ruphbr_u:2426: ramyā cormir madhurima-pūre nūpure cety aghārer
GR14ruphbr_u:2427: aṅgair evābharaṇa-paṭalī bhūṣitā dogdhi bhūṣām || RBhrs_2,1.360 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2437: pulakayati vapur naḥ kāpy apūrvā munīnām |
GR14ruphbr_u:2445: eṣa tridhā bhaved veṇu-muralī-vaṃśikety api || RBhrs_2,1.365 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2448: sthaulye 'ṅguṣṭha-mitaḥ ṣaḍbhir eṣa randhraiḥ samanvitaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.366 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2454: tataḥ sārdhāṅgulād yatra mukha-randhraṃ tathāṅgulam || RBhrs_2,1.368 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2455: śiro vedāṅgulaṃ pucchaṃ try-aṅgulaṃ sā tu vaṃśikā |
GR14ruphbr_u:2458: mahānandeti vyākhyātā tathā saṃmohinīti ca || RBhrs_2,1.370 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2459: bhavet sūryāntarā sā cet tata ākarṣiṇī matā |
GR14ruphbr_u:2460: ānandinī tadā vaṃśī bhaved indrāntarā yadi || RBhrs_2,1.371 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2461: gopānāṃ vallabhā seyaṃ vaṃśulīti ca viśrutā |
GR14ruphbr_u:2462: kramān maṇimayī haimī vaiṇavīti tridhā ca sā || RBhrs_2,1.372 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2475: bahir adya hanta guravaḥ puraḥ sthitāḥ || RBhrs_2,1.375 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2487: prabhor amūny aṅghri-rajāṃsy aho iti || RBhrs_2,1.378 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2497: praviśan nāma mano dhinoti naḥ || RBhrs_2,1.380 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2498: atha tulasī, yathā bilvamaṅgale {*Not in any of the KK centuries.}--
GR14ruphbr_u:2512: kathaya sa dayitas te kvāyam āste vayasyaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.383 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2523: te bahir vikriyā prāyāḥ proktā udbhāsvarākhyayā || RBhrs_2,2.1 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2527: te śītāḥ kṣepaṇāś ceti yathārthākhyā dvidhoditāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:2528: śītāḥ syur gīta-jṛmbhādyā nṛtyādyāḥ kṣepaṇābhidhāḥ || RBhrs_2,2.3 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2580: aho paśyata nārīṇām api kṛṣṇe jagad-gurau |
GR14ruphbr_u:2588: śaṅke prema-bhujaṅgena daṣṭaḥ kaṣṭaṃ gato muniḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:2589: niścalasya yad etasya lālā sravati vaktrataḥ || RBhrs_2,2.16 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2603: na putri racayauṣadhaṃ visṛja romam atyuddhataṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:2604: mudhā priya-sakhīṃ prati tvam aśivaṃ kim āśaṅkase |
GR14ruphbr_u:2606: varākṣi harir ity asau vitanute 'dya hikkā-bharam || RBhrs_2,2.20 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2616: bhāvaiś cittam ihākrāntaṃ sattvam ity ucyate budhaiḥ || RBhrs_2,3.1 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2617: sattvād asmāt samutpannā ye ye bhāvās te tu sāttvikāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:2618: snigdhā digdhās tathā rukṣā ity amī trividhā matāḥ || RBhrs_2,3.2 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2620: snigdhās tu sāttvikā mukhyā gauṇāś ceti dvidhā matāḥ || RBhrs_2,3.3 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2622: ākramān mukhyayā ratyā mukhyāḥ syuḥ sāttvikā amī |
GR14ruphbr_u:2623: vijñeyaḥ kṛṣṇa-sambandhaḥ sākṣād evātra sūribhiḥ || RBhrs_2,3.4 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2629: mukhyaḥ stambho 'yam itthaṃ te jñeyāḥ svedādayo 'pi ca || RBhrs_2,3.6 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2632: atra kṛṣṇasya sambandhaḥ syāt kiñcid vyavadhānataḥ || RBhrs_2,3.7 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2641: jane jāta-ratau digdhās te ced raty-anugāminaḥ || RBhrs_2,3.9 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2647: kampo raty-anugāmitvād asau digdha itīryate || RBhrs_2,3.11 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2650: jātā bhaktopame rukṣā rati-śūnye jane kvacit || RBhrs_2,3.12 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2658: mumukṣu-prabhṛtau pūrvaṃ yo ratābhyāsa īritaḥ || RBhrs_2,3.14 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2659: cittaṃ sattvībhavat prāṇe nyasyaty ātmānam udbhaṭam |
GR14ruphbr_u:2660: prāṇas tu vikriyāṃ gacchan dehaṃ vikṣobhayaty alam |
GR14ruphbr_u:2661: tadā stambhādayo bhāvā bhakta-dehe bhavanty amī || RBhrs_2,3.15 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2663: vaivarṇyam aśru pralaya ity aṣṭau sāttvikāḥ smṛtāḥ || RBhrs_2,3.16 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2665: kadācit sva-pradhānaḥ san dehe carati sarvataḥ || RBhrs_2,3.17 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2669: romāñca-kampa-vaivarṇyāṇy atra trīṇi tanoty asau || RBhrs_2,3.19 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2670: bahir antaś ca vikṣobha-vidhāyitvād ataḥ sphuṭam |
GR14ruphbr_u:2687: tad-dhāmnābhūd ajas tūṣṇīṃ pūr-devy-antīva putrikā || RBhrs_2,3.24 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2689: śiśoḥ śyāmasya paśyantī śailam abhraṃlihaṃ kare |
GR14ruphbr_u:2727: kiṃ te kṛtaṃ kṣiti tapo bata keśavāṅghri-
GR14ruphbr_u:2733: śrīdāmno yoddhu-kāmasya reme romāñcitaṃ vapuḥ || RBhrs_2,3.35 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2741: vaisvaryaṃ svara-bhedaḥ syād eṣa gadgadikādikṛt || RBhrs_2,3.37 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2762: tvayy arpitaṃ vitara veṇum iti pramādī
GR14ruphbr_u:2765: patrī mukunda tad anena sa hārito 'sti || RBhrs_2,3.42 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2775: cakampe drāg amarṣeṇa bhū-kampe girirāḍ iva || RBhrs_2,3.45 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2777: vihasasi kathaṃ hatāśe paśya bhayenādya kampamānāsmi |
GR14ruphbr_u:2778: cañcalam upasīdantaṃ nivāraya vraja-pates tanayam || RBhrs_2,3.46 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2784: gokulaṃ kṛṣṇa devarṣeḥ śvetadvīpa-bhramaṃ dadhe || RBhrs_2,3.48 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2795: viṣāde śvetimā proktā dhausaryaṃ kālimā kvacit |
GR14ruphbr_u:2796: roṣe tu raktimā bhītyāṃ kālimā kvāpi śuklimā || RBhrs_2,3.51 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2827: nābhyajānan imaṃ lokam ātma-lokaṃ gatā iva || RBhrs_2,3.60 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2828: sarve hi sattva-mūlatvād bhāvā yadyapi sāttvikāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:2831: tata eva tāratamyaṃ sarveṣāṃ sāttvikānāṃ syāt || RBhrs_2,3.62 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2833: vṛddhiṃ yathottaraṃ yāntaḥ sāttvikāḥ syuś catur-vidhāḥ || RBhrs_2,3.63 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2835: svarūpeṇa tathotkarṣa iti vṛddhis tridhā bhavet || RBhrs_2,3.64 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2843: prāyo dhūmāyitā eva rukṣās tiṣṭhanti sāttvikāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:2844: snigdhās tu prāyaśaḥ sarve caturdhaiva bhavanty amī || RBhrs_2,3.68 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:2846: jvalanty ullāsinaḥ kvāpi te rukṣā api kasyacit || RBhrs_2,3.69 ||
