GR14ruphbr_u:3517: druta-gati harim ārāt prāpya kuñje smitākṣī |
GR14ruphbr_u:3519: snapayati nija-dāsye rādhikā māṃ kadā nu || RBhrs_2,4.153 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3531: huta-bhuji bata kuryāṃ jāṭhare vauṣaḍ enaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:3532: sapadi danuja-hantuḥ kintu roṣād bibhemi || RBhrs_2,4.156 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3535: na hi danuja-ripor yaḥ prauṅdha-kīrter visoḍhum |
GR14ruphbr_u:3537: śirasi pṛthuni tasya nyasyate savya-pādaḥ || RBhrs_2,4.157 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3541: hahā bata viḍambanā śiva śivādya naḥ śṛṇvatāṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:3542: haṭhād iha kaṭākṣayanty akhila-vandyam apy acyutam || RBhrs_2,4.158 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3549: kalyāṇī me nivasati vadhūḥ paśya pārśve navoḍhā |
GR14ruphbr_u:3551: niḥśaṅkas tvaṃ bhramasi bhavitā nākulatvaṃ kuto me || RBhrs_2,4.161 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3554: jane bhavati mad-vidhe paribhavo hi nātaḥ paraḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:3556: varāpi yad ayogyayā sphuṭam adūṣi tārākhyayā || RBhrs_2,4.162 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3561: kitava yoṣitaḥ kas tyajen niśi || RBhrs_2,4.163 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3567: {*Attributed to Dāmodara in Padyāvalī. Also found in Amaru 55;
GR14ruphbr_u:3570: SāhD 3.105 (as an example of mada); Daśa 2.22.}--
GR14ruphbr_u:3573: anyāpi kiṃ na sakhi bhājanam īdṛśīnāṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:3574: vairī na ced bhavati vepathur antarāyaḥ || RBhrs_2,4.165 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3576: tasyā amūni naḥ kṣobhaṃ kurvanty uccaiḥ padāni yat |
GR14ruphbr_u:3579: svayaṃ parājayaṃ prāptān kṛṣṇa-pakṣān vijitya naḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:3580: baliṣṭhā bala-pakṣāś ced durbalāḥ ke tataḥ kṣitau || RBhrs_2,4.167 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3591: guror api puro nīvīṃ yā bhraṃśayati subhruvām || RBhrs_2,4.170 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3605: sukham avicalad-aṅgāḥ śerate paśya gopāḥ || RBhrs_2,4.174 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3608: vakṣasi nikṣiptāṅgī harer viśākhā yayau nidrām || RBhrs_2,4.175 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3610: hṛn-mīlanāt puro 'vasthā nidrā bhakteṣu kathyate || RBhrs_2,4.176 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3616: darpaḥ sarpa-pates tad asya tarasā nirdhūyatām uddhūraḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:3617: ity utsvapna-girā cirād yadu-sabhāṃ vismāpayan smerayan
GR14ruphbr_u:3618: niḥśvāsena darottaraṅgad-udaraṃ nidrāṃ gato lāṅgalī || RBhrs_2,4.178 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3646: drutaṃ mūrcchām antaḥ sakhi sukha-mayīṃ pallavayati || RBhrs_2,4.185 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3656: iyaṃ te hāsa-śrīr viramatu vimuñcāñcalam idaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:3658: iti svapne jalpanty aciram avabuddhā gurum asau
GR14ruphbr_u:3659: puro dṛṣṭvā gaurī namita-mukha-bimbā muhur abhūt || RBhrs_2,4.188 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3661: dūtī cāgāt tad-āgāraṃ jajāgāra ca rādhikā |
GR14ruphbr_u:3662: tūrṇaṃ puṇyavatīnāṃ hi tanoti phalam udyamaḥ || RBhrs_2,4.189 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3669: klaibyaṃ kṣamā ca kutukam utkaṇṭhā vinayo 'pi ca || RBhrs_2,4.192 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3670: saṃśayo dhārṣṭyam ity ādyā bhāvā ye syuḥ pare 'pi ca |
GR14ruphbr_u:3671: ukteṣv antarbhavantīti na pṛthaktvena darśitāḥ || RBhrs_2,4.193 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3673: asūyāyāṃ tu mātsaryaṃ trāse 'py udvega eva tu |
GR14ruphbr_u:3675: viveko nirṇayaś cemau dainye klaibyaṃ kṣamā dhṛtau || RBhrs_2,4.194 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3677: saṃśayo 'ntarbhavet tarke tathā dhārṣṭyaṃ ca cāpale || RBhrs_2,4.195 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3679: vibhāvaś cānubhāvaś ca bhaved eva parasparam || RBhrs_2,4.196 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3680: nirvede tu yatherṣyāyā bhaved atra vibhāvatā |
GR14ruphbr_u:3681: asūyāyāṃ punas tasyā vyaktam uktānubhāvatā || RBhrs_2,4.197 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3683: nidrāṃ prati vibhāvatvam evaṃ jñeyaḥ pare 'py amī || RBhrs_2,4.198 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3684: eṣāṃ ca sāttvikānāṃ ca tathā nānā-kriyā-tateḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:3685: kārya-kāraṇa-bhāvas tu jñeyaḥ prāyeṇa lokataḥ || RBhrs_2,4.199 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3689: augryaṃ pratyanubhāvatvam evaṃ jñeyāḥ pare 'pi ca || RBhrs_2,4.201 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3691: sañcāriṇām iha kvāpi bhaved raty-anubhāvatā || RBhrs_2,4.202 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3692: sākṣād-rater na sambandhaḥ ṣaḍbhis trāsādibhiḥ saha |
GR14ruphbr_u:3696: paratantrāḥ svatantrāś cety uktāḥ sañcāriṇo dvidhā || RBhrs_2,4.205 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3698: varāvaratayā proktāḥ paratantrā api dvidhā || RBhrs_2,4.206 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3700: sākṣād vyavahitaś ceti varo 'py eṣa dvidhoditaḥ || RBhrs_2,4.207 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3702: mukhyām eva ratiṃ puṣṇan sākṣād ity abhidhīyate || RBhrs_2,4.208 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3707: vyarthena kiṃ hanta dṛśor dvayena || RBhrs_2,4.209 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3709: puṣṇāti yo ratiṃ gauṇīṃ sa vyavahito mataḥ || RBhrs_2,4.210 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3711: dhig astu me bhuja-dvandvaṃ bhīmasya parighopamam |
GR14ruphbr_u:3712: mādhavākṣepiṇaṃ duṣṭaṃ yat pinaṣṭi na cedipam || RBhrs_2,4.211 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3713: nirvedaḥ krodha-vaśyatvād ayaṃ vyavahito rateḥ || RBhrs_2,4.212 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3715: rasa-dvayasyāpy aṅgatvam agacchann avaro mataḥ || RBhrs_2,4.213 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3720: na svaṃ viśuṣyan smarati sma jiṣṇuḥ || RBhrs_2,4.214 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3722: durvarāvirabhūd bhītir moho 'yaṃ bhī-vaśas tataḥ || RBhrs_2,4.215 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3727: rati-gandhiś ca te tredhā svatantrāḥ parikīrtitāḥ || RBhrs_2,4.217 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3729: janeṣu rati-śūnyeṣu rati-śūnyo bhaved asau || RBhrs_2,4.218 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3731: dhig janma nas trivṛd-vidyāṃ dhig vrataṃ dhig bahujñatām |
GR14ruphbr_u:3732: dhik kulaṃ dhik kriyā-dīkṣāṃ vimukhā ye tv adhokṣaje || RBhrs_2,4.219 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3736: paścād ratiṃ spṛśed eṣa raty-anusparśano mataḥ || RBhrs_2,4.220 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3739: hā kṛṣṇa pāhi pāhīti cukrośābhīra-bālikā || RBhrs_2,4.221 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3742: yaḥ svātantrye 'pi tad-gandhaṃ rati-gandhir vyanakti saḥ || RBhrs_2,4.222 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3745: saṅgopanāya na hi naptri vidhehi yatnam |
GR14ruphbr_u:3749: ābhāsaḥ punar eteṣām asthāne vṛttito bhavet |
GR14ruphbr_u:3752: vipakṣe vṛttir eteṣāṃ prātikūlyam itīryate || RBhrs_2,4.225 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3767: aprāṇini bhaved ādyaḥ tiryag-ādiṣu cāntimam || RBhrs_2,4.228 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3769: chāyā na yasya sakṛd apy upasevitābhūt
GR14ruphbr_u:3770: kṛṣṇena hanta mama tasya dhig astu janma |
GR14ruphbr_u:3771: mā tvaṃ kadamba vidhuro bhava kāliyāhiṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:3772: mṛdnan kariṣyati hariś caritārthatāṃ te || RBhrs_2,4.229 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3775: adhirohatu kaḥ pakṣī kakṣām aparo mamādya medhyasya |
GR14ruphbr_u:3776: hitvāpi tārkṣya-paksaṃ bhajate pakṣaṃ harir yasya || RBhrs_2,4.230 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3781: daśāś catasra etāsām utpattis tv iha sambhavaḥ || RBhrs_2,4.232 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3790: uṣasi sakhi tavālī mekhalā paśya bhāti |
GR14ruphbr_u:3792: dṛśam anṛju kirantī rādhikā vaḥ punātu || RBhrs_2,4.234 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3795: sarūpayor bhinnayor vā sandhiḥ syād bhāvayor yutiḥ || RBhrs_2,4.235 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3797: sandhiḥ sarūpayos tatra bhinna-hetūtthayor mataḥ || RBhrs_2,4.236 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3807: durvāracāpalo 'yaṃ dhāvann antar bahiś ca goṣṭhasya |
GR14ruphbr_u:3808: śiśur akutaścid bhītir dhinoti hṛdayaṃ dunoti ca me || RBhrs_2,4.239 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3814: himam uṣṇaṃ ca jalaṃ dṛśor dadhe || RBhrs_2,4.240 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3817: bahūnām api bhāvānāṃ sandhiḥ sphuṭam avekṣyate || RBhrs_2,4.241 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3822: dṛśaṃ nyasyanty asmin jayati vṛṣabhānoḥ kula-maṇiḥ || RBhrs_2,4.242 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3827: harim api dara-dūre svāminaṃ tatra cāsīn
GR14ruphbr_u:3831: śavalatvaṃ tu bhāvānāṃ saṃmardaḥ syāt parasparam || RBhrs_2,4.244 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3833: śaktaḥ kiṃ nāma kartuṃ sa śiśur ahaha me mitra-pakṣānadhākṣīd
GR14ruphbr_u:3834: ātiṣṭheyaṃ tam eva drutam atha śaraṇaṃ kuryur etan na vīrāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:3835: āṃ divyā malla-goṣṭhī viharati sa kareṇoddadhārādri-varyaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:3836: kuryām adyaiva gatvā vraja-bhuvi kadanaṃ hā tataḥ kampate dhīḥ || RBhrs_2,4.245 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3839: dhig dīrghe nayane mamāstu mathurā yābhyāṃ na sā prekṣyate
GR14ruphbr_u:3840: vidyeyaṃ mama kiṅkarī-kṛta-nṛpā kālas tu sarvaṅkaraḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:3841: lakṣmī-keli-gṛhaṃ gṛhaṃ mama hahā nityaṃ tanuḥ kṣīyate
GR14ruphbr_u:3842: sadmany eva hariṃ bhajeya hṛdayaṃ vṛndāṭavī karṣati || RBhrs_2,4.246 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3845: atyārūḍhasya bhāvasya vilayaḥ śāntir ucyate || RBhrs_2,4.247 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3854: trayastriṃśad ime 'ṣṭau ca vakṣyante sthāyinaś ca ye |
GR14ruphbr_u:3855: mukhya-bhāvābhidhās tv eka-catvāriṃśad amī smṛtāḥ || RBhrs_2,4.250 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3858: kvacit svābhāviko bhāvaḥ kaścid āgantukaḥ kvacit |
GR14ruphbr_u:3859: yas tu svābhāviko bhāvaḥ sa vyāpyāntar-bahiḥ-sthitaḥ || RBhrs_2,4.252 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3860: mañjiṣṭhādye yathā dravye rāgas tan-maya īkṣyate |
GR14ruphbr_u:3861: atra syān nāma-mātreṇa vibhāvasya vibhāvatā || RBhrs_2,4.253 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3863: eka-rūpāpi yā bhakter vividhā pratibhāty asau || RBhrs_2,4.254 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3864: āgantukas tu yo bhāvaḥ paṭādau raktimeva saḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:3865: tais tair vibhāvair evāyaṃ dhīyate dīpyate 'pi ca || RBhrs_2,4.255 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3868: vividhānāṃ tu bhaktānāṃ vaiśiṣṭyād vividhaṃ manaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:3871: samyag-unmīlitāś cāmī na lakṣyante sphuṭaṃ janaiḥ || RBhrs_2,4.258 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3873: manāg-unmīlitāś cāmī lakṣyante bahir ulbaṇāḥ || RBhrs_2,4.259 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3878: pattanābhaṃ mahiṣṭhaṃ syāt kṣodiṣṭhaṃ tu kuṭiravat |
GR14ruphbr_u:3880: karkaśaṃ trividhaṃ proktaṃ vajraṃ svarṇaṃ tathā jatu |
GR14ruphbr_u:3883: īdṛśaṃ tāpasādīnāṃ cittaṃ tāvad avekṣyate || RBhrs_2,4.264 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3885: jatu dravatvam āyāti tāpa-leśena sarvataḥ || RBhrs_2,4.265 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3887: amṛtaṃ ceti bhāvo 'tra prāyaḥ sūryātapāyate || RBhrs_2,4.266 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3890: govinda-preṣṭha-varyāṇāṃ cittaṃ syād amṛtaṃ kila || RBhrs_2,4.267 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3892: samavetaṃ sadāmībhir dvitrair api mano bhavet || RBhrs_2,4.268 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3893: kintu suṣṭhu mahiṣṭhatvaṃ bhāvo bāḍham upāgataḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:3894: sarva-prakāram evedaṃ cittaṃ vikṣobhayaty alam || RBhrs_2,4.269 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3897: ahāryāṃ maryādāṃ dadhad api harer āspadam api |
GR14ruphbr_u:3898: satāṃ stomaḥ premaṇy udayati samagre sthagayituṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:3899: vikāraṃ na sphāraṃ jala-nidhir ivendau prabhavati || RBhrs_2,4.270 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3905: aviruddhān viruddhāṃś ca bhāvān yo vaśatāṃ nayan |
GR14ruphbr_u:3906: su-rājeva virājeta sa sthāyī bhāva ucyate || RBhrs_2,5.1 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3907: sthāyī bhāvo 'tra sa proktaḥ śrī-kṛṣṇa-viṣayā ratiḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:3908: mukhyā gauṇī ca sā dvedhā rasa-jñaiḥ parikīrtitā || RBhrs_2,5.2 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3911: mukhyāpi dvi-vidhā svārthā parārthā ceti kīrtyate || RBhrs_2,5.3 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3913: aviruddhaiḥ sphuṭaṃ bhāvaiḥ puṣṇāty ātmānam eva yā |
GR14ruphbr_u:3914: viruddhair duḥkha-glāniḥ sā svārthā kathitā ratiḥ || RBhrs_2,5.4 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3916: aviruddhaṃ viruddhaṃ ca saṅkucantī svayaṃ ratiḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:3917: yā bhāvam anugṛhṇāti sā parārthā nigadyate || RBhrs_2,5.5 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3918: śuddhā prītis tathā sakhyaṃ vātsalyaṃ priyatety asau |
GR14ruphbr_u:3919: svaparārthyaiva sā mukhyā punaḥ pañca-vidhā bhavet || RBhrs_2,5.6 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3923: sāmānyāsau tathā svacchā śāntiś cety ādimā tridhā |
GR14ruphbr_u:3927: bālikadaiś ca kṛṣṇe syāt sāmānyā sā ratir matā || RBhrs_2,5.9 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3929: asmin mathurā-vīthyām udayati madhure virocane purataḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:3930: kathasva sakhe mradimānaṃ mānasa-madanaṃ kim eti mama || RBhrs_2,5.10 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3933: yā puraḥ kṛṣṇam ālokya huṅkurvaty abhidhāvati || RBhrs_2,5.11 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3936: sādhākānāṃ tu vaividhyaṃ yāntī svacchā ratir matā || RBhrs_2,5.12 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3937: yadā yādṛśī bhakte syād āsaktis tādṛśaṃ tadā |
GR14ruphbr_u:3938: rūpaṃ sphaṭikavad dhatte svacchāsau tena kīrtitā || RBhrs_2,5.13 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3940: kvacit prabhur iti stuvan kvacana mitram ity uddhasan
GR14ruphbr_u:3941: kvacit tanaya ity avan kvacana kānta ity ullasan |
GR14ruphbr_u:3942: kvacin manasi bhāvayan parama eṣa ātmety asāv
GR14ruphbr_u:3943: abhūd vividha-sevayā vividha-vṛttir āryo dvijaḥ || RBhrs_2,5.14 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3945: āryāṇām atiśuddhānāṃ prāyaḥ svacchā ratir bhavet || RBhrs_2,5.15 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3947: mānase nirvikalpatvaṃ śama ity abhidhīyate || RBhrs_2,5.16 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3950: ātmanaḥ kathyate so 'tra svabhāvaḥ śama ity asau || RBhrs_2,5.17 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3952: paramātmatayā kṛṣṇe jātā śānta-ratir matā || RBhrs_2,5.18 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3955: sanakasya tanau kampo brahmānubhavino 'py abhūt || RBhrs_2,5.19 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3960: paramaṃ brahma didṛkṣate mano me || RBhrs_2,5.20 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3962: rater asyā asamparkād iyaṃ śuddheti bhaṇyate || RBhrs_2,5.21 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3963: atha bheda-trayī hṛdyā rateḥ prīty-ādir īryate |
GR14ruphbr_u:3966: tri-vidheṣu trayī prītiḥ sakhyaṃ vatsalatety asau || RBhrs_2,5.23 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3968: kevalā saṅkulā ceti dvi-vidheyaṃ rati-trayī || RBhrs_2,5.24 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3972: gurau ca vrajanāthādau krameṇaiva sphuraty asau || RBhrs_2,5.25 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3974: eṣāṃ dvayos trayāṇāṃ vā sannipātas tu saṅkulā |
GR14ruphbr_u:3975: udbhavādau ca bhīmādau mathurādau krameṇa sā |
GR14ruphbr_u:3976: yasyādhikyaṃ bhaved yatra sa tena vyapadiśyate || RBhrs_2,5.26 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3978: svasmād bhavanti ye nyūnās te 'nugrāhyā harer matāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:3979: ārādhyatvātmikā teṣāṃ ratiḥ prītir itīritā || RBhrs_2,5.27 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3980: tatrāsakti-kṛd anyatra prīti-saṃhāriṇī hy asau || RBhrs_2,5.28 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:3982: divi vā bhuvi vā mamāstu vāso
GR14ruphbr_u:3987: ye syus tulyā mukundasya te sakhāyaḥ satāṃ matāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:3998: sadyas tvayā tad api kathanam eva kṛtvā
GR14ruphbr_u:3999: devyai hriye trayam adāyi jvalāñjalīnām || RBhrs_2,5.32 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4001: guravo ye harer asya te pūjyā iti viśrutāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4007: gās tatra rakṣitum asau gahane mṛdur me
GR14ruphbr_u:4008: bālaḥ prayāty avirataṃ bata kiṃ karomi || RBhrs_2,5.34 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4021: ratir vāsanayā svādvī bhāsate kāpi kasyacit || RBhrs_2,5.38 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4024: saṅkucantyā svayaṃ ratyā sa gauṇī ratir ucyate || RBhrs_2,5.39 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4025: hāso vismaya utsāhaḥ śokaḥ krodho bhayaṃ tathā |
GR14ruphbr_u:4026: jugupsā cety asau bhāva-viśeṣaḥ saptadhoditaḥ || RBhrs_2,5.40 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4028: syād dehādi-vibhāvatvaṃ saptamyās tu rater vaśāt || RBhrs_2,5.41 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4030: parārthāyā rater yogād rati-śabdaḥ prayujyate || RBhrs_2,5.42 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4031: hāsottarā ratir yā syāt sā hāsa-ratir ucyate |
GR14ruphbr_u:4032: evaṃ vismaya-raty-ādyā vijñeyā ratayaś ca ṣaṭ || RBhrs_2,5.43 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4033: kañcit kālaṃ kvacid bhakte hāsādyāḥ sthāyitām amī |
GR14ruphbr_u:4036: sahajā api līyante baliṣṭhena tiraskṛtāḥ || RBhrs_2,5.45 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4039: syur etasyā vinā-bhāvād bhāvāḥ sarve nirarthakāḥ || RBhrs_2,5.46 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4043: nirvedādyā vilīyante nārhanti sthāyitāṃ tataḥ || RBhrs_2,5.48 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4044: ity ato mati-garvādi-bhāvānāṃ ghaṭate na hi |
GR14ruphbr_u:4045: sthāyitā kaiścid iṣṭāpi pramāṇaṃ tatra tad-vidaḥ || RBhrs_2,5.49 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4046: sapta hāsādayas tv ete tais tair nītāḥ supuṣṭatām |
GR14ruphbr_u:4047: bhakteṣu sthāyitāṃ yānto rucir ebhyo vitanvate || RBhrs_2,5.50 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4057: mayā dṛg api nārpitā sumukhi dadhni tubhyaṃ śape
GR14ruphbr_u:4058: sakhī tava nirargalā tad api me mukhaṃ jighrati |
GR14ruphbr_u:4059: praśādhi tad imāṃ mudhā cchalita-sādhum ity acyute
GR14ruphbr_u:4060: vadaty ajani dūtikā hasita-rodhane na kṣamā || RBhrs_2,5.54 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4064: pūrvokta-rītyā niṣpannaḥ sa vismaya-ratir bhavet || RBhrs_2,5.55 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4069: para-brahmollāsān vahati kim idaṃ hanta kim idam || RBhrs_2,5.56 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4072: satvarā mānasāsaktir utsāha iti kīrtyate || RBhrs_2,5.57 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4074: siddhaḥ pūrvokta-vidhinā sa utsāha ratir bhavet || RBhrs_2,5.58 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4112: niṣpannaṃ pūrvavad idaṃ budhā bhaya-ratiṃ viduḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4113: eṣāpi krodha-rativad dvi-vidhā kathitā budhaiḥ || RBhrs_2,5.68 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4127: rater anugrahāj jātā sā jugupsā-ratir matā || RBhrs_2,5.71 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4134: ity aṣṭau sthāyino yāvad rasāvasthāṃ na saṃśritāḥ || RBhrs_2,5.73 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4136: ihāṣṭau sāttvikāś caite bhāvākhyās tān asaṅkhyakāḥ || RBhrs_2,5.74 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4142: prāyaḥ sukha-mayāḥ śītā uṣṇā duḥkha-mayā iha |
GR14ruphbr_u:4143: citreyaṃ paramānanda-sāndrāpy uṣṇā ratir matā || RBhrs_2,5.77 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4144: śītair bhāvair baliṣṭhais tu puṣṭā śītāyate hy asau |
GR14ruphbr_u:4145: uṣṇais tu ratir atyuṣṇā tāpayantīva bhāsate || RBhrs_2,5.78 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4146: ratir dvidhāpi kṛṣṇādyaiḥ śrutair avagataiḥ smṛtaiḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4147: tair vibhāvāditāṃ yadbhis tad-bhakteṣu raso bhavet || RBhrs_2,5.79 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4156: gacchanto rasa-rūpatvaṃ militā yānty akhaṇḍatām || RBhrs_2,5.83 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4158: udbhāsaḥ kasyacit kvāpi vibhāvādes tathā rase || RBhrs_2,5.84 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4160: stambhādyāḥ kāra-bhūtāś ca nirvedādyāḥ sahāyakāḥ || RBhrs_2,5.85 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4164: vibhāvayanti kurvantīty uktā dhīrair vibhāvakāḥ || RBhrs_2,5.87 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4166: ity uktā anubhāvās te kaṭākṣādyāḥ sa-sāttvikāḥ || RBhrs_2,5.88 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4168: ye nirvedādayo bhāvās te tu sañcāriṇo matāḥ || RBhrs_2,5.89 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4170: sevām āhuḥ paraṃ hetuṃ kecit tat-pakṣa-rāgiṇaḥ || RBhrs_2,5.90 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4172: rater asyāḥ prabhāvo 'yaṃ bhavet kāraṇam uttamam || RBhrs_2,5.91 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4174: raty-ākhyā ity ayaṃ yukto na hi tarkeṇa bādhitum |
GR14ruphbr_u:4175: bhāratādy-uktir eṣā hi prāktanair apy udāhṛtā || RBhrs_2,5.92 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4177: acintyāḥ khalu ye bhāvā na tāṃs tarkeṇa yojayet
GR14ruphbr_u:4178: prakṛtibhyaḥ paraṃ yac ca tad acintyasya lakṣaṇam || RBhrs_2,5.93 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4180: etair eva tathābhūtaiḥ svaṃ saṃvardhayati sphuṭam || RBhrs_2,5.94 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4181: yathā svair eva salilaiḥ paripūrya balāhakān |
GR14ruphbr_u:4182: ratnālayo bhavaty ebhir vṛṣṭais tair eva vāridhiḥ || RBhrs_2,5.95 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4186: rater eva prabhāvo 'yaṃ hetus teṣāṃ tathākṛtau || RBhrs_2,5.97 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4188: tathānubhūyamānās te vistīrṇāṃ kurvate ratim || RBhrs_2,5.98 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4190: atra sāhāyikaṃ vyaktaṃ mitho 'jasram avekṣyate || RBhrs_2,5.99 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4191: kintv etasyāḥ prabhāvo 'pi vairūpye sati kuñcati |
GR14ruphbr_u:4192: vairūpyas tu vibhāvāder anaucityam udīryate || RBhrs_2,5.100 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4194: yatra sādhāraṇatayā bhāvāḥ sādhu sphuranty amī || RBhrs_2,5.101 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4196: sādhāraṇyaṃ tad evoktaṃ bhāvānāṃ pūrva-sūribhiḥ || RBhrs_2,5.102 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4199: pramātā tad-abhedena svaṃ yayā pratipadyate || RBhrs_2,5.103 || iti |
GR14ruphbr_u:4200: duḥkhādayaḥ sphuranto 'pi jātu bhāntaḥ svīyatayā hṛdi |
GR14ruphbr_u:4208: rasaḥ syān neti nāṭya-jñā yad āhur yuktam eva tat || RBhrs_2,5.107 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4210: yoge rasa-viśeṣatvaṃ gacchanty eva hari-priye || RBhrs_2,5.108 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4219: rasasya sva-prakāśatvam akhaṇḍatvaṃ ca sidhyati || RBhrs_2,5.112 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4220: pūrvam uktād dvidhā bhdedān mukhya-gauṇatayā rateḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4221: bhaved bhakti-raso 'py eṣa mukhya-gauṇatayā dvidhā || RBhrs_2,5.113 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4222: pañcadhāpi rater aikyān mukhyas tv eka ihoditaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4223: saptadhātra tathā gauṇa iti bhakti-raso 'ṣṭadhā || RBhrs_2,5.114 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4225: mukhyas tu pañcadhā śāntaḥ prītaḥ preyāṃś ca vatsalaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4226: madhuraś cety amī jñeyā yathā-pūrvam anuttamāḥ || RBhrs_2,5.115 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4228: hāsyo 'dbhutas tathā vīraḥ karuṇo raudra ity api |
GR14ruphbr_u:4229: bhayānakaḥ sa bībhatsa iti gauṇaś ca saptadhā || RBhrs_2,5.116 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4231: vastutas tu purāṇādau pañcadhaiva vilokyate || RBhrs_2,5.117 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4233: gauro dhūmras tathā raktaḥ kālo nītaḥ kramād amī || RBhrs_2,5.118 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4235: balaḥ kūrmas tathā kalkī rāghavo bhārgavaḥ kiriḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4236: mīna ity eṣu kathitāḥ kramād dvādaśa devatāḥ || RBhrs_2,5.119 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4239: pūrtiḥ śānte vikāśas tu prītādiṣv api pañcasu |
GR14ruphbr_u:4241: bhayānake 'tha bībhatse kṣobho dhīrair udāhṛtaḥ || RBhrs_2,5.121 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4244: pratīyamānā apy ajñair grāmyaiḥ sapadi duḥkhavat |
GR14ruphbr_u:4245: karuṇādyā rasāḥ prājñaiḥ prauḍhānanda-mayā matāḥ || RBhrs_2,5.123 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4247: sad-uktyā ca sukhaṃ tebhyaḥ syāt suvyaktam iti sthitiḥ || RBhrs_2,5.124 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4249: karuṇādāv api rase jāyate yat paraṃ sukham |
GR14ruphbr_u:4250: sucetasām anubhavaḥ pramāṇaṃ tatra kevalam || RBhrs_2,5.125 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4254: prītyā rāmāyaṇaṃ nityaṃ hanumān śṛṇuyāt katham || RBhrs_2,5.127 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4256: sañcārī syāt samāno vā kṛṣṇa-ratyāḥ suhṛd-ratiḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4257: adhikā puṣyamāṇā ced bhāvollāsā ratiḥ || RBhrs_2,5.128 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4260: ity eṣa bhakti-rasikaś caurād iva mahā-nidhiḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4265: hṛdi sattvojjvale bāḍhaṃ svadate sa raso mataḥ || RBhrs_2,5.132 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4267: bhāvyate gāḍha-saṃskāraiś citte bhāvaḥ sa kathyate || RBhrs_2,5.133 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4283: sa mayi sanātana-mūrtis tanotu puruṣottamas tuṣṭim || RBhrs_3,1.1 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4285: mukhyo bhakti-rasaḥ pañcavidhaḥ śāntādīr īryate || RBhrs_3,1.2 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4287: athāmī pañca lakṣyante rasāḥ śāntādayaḥ kramāt || RBhrs_3,1.3 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4290: sthāyī śānti-ratir dhīraiḥ śānta-bhakti-rasaḥ smṛtaḥ || RBhrs_3,1.4 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4291: prāyaḥ sva-sukha-jātīyaṃ sukhaṃ syād atra yoginām |
GR14ruphbr_u:4292: kintv ātma-saukhyam aghanaṃ ghanaṃ tv īśam ayaṃ sukham || RBhrs_3,1.5 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4296: caturbhujaś ca śāntāś ca asminn ālambanā matāḥ || RBhrs_3,1.7 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4303: paramātmā paraṃ brahma śamo dāntaḥ śucir vaśī || RBhrs_3,1.9 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4305: vibhur ity ādi guṇavān asminn ālambano hariḥ || RBhrs_3,1.10 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4311: prādhānyāt sanakādīnāṃ rūpaṃ bhaktiś ca kathyate || RBhrs_3,1.12 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4317: gate kim api vastuni svayam adīpi tāvat sukham |
GR14ruphbr_u:4319: mukunda sukha-cid-ghanā tava babhūva sākṣāt-kṛtiḥ || RBhrs_3,1.14 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4322: anujjhita-mumukṣā ye bhajante te tu tāpasāḥ || RBhrs_3,1.15 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4326: hṛdi dhyāyaṃ dhyāyaṃ muhur iha mukundābhidham ahaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:4327: cidānandaṃ jyotiḥ kṣaṇam iva vineṣyāmi rajanīḥ || RBhrs_3,1.16 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4335: eṣv asādhāraṇāḥ proktā budhair uddīpanā amī || RBhrs_3,1.19 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4344: ityādy uddīpanā sādhāraṇās teṣāṃ kilāśritaiḥ || RBhrs_3,1.22 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4353: harer dviṣy api na dveṣo nātibhaktiḥ priyeṣv api |
GR14ruphbr_u:4354: siddhatāyās tathā jīvan-mukteś ca bahu-mānitā || RBhrs_3,1.25 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4356: maunam ity ādayaḥ śītāḥ syur asādhāraṇāḥ kriyāḥ || RBhrs_3,1.26 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4363: stavādayaś ca dāsādyaiḥ śītāḥ sādhāraṇāḥ kriyāḥ || RBhrs_3,1.28 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4377: sāttvikās tu jvalanty eva na tu dīptā bhavanty amī || RBhrs_3,1.32 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4379: sañcārino 'tra nirvedo dhṛtir harṣo matiḥ smṛtiḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4385: vṛthā gato bata ciraṃ kālaḥ || RBhrs_3,1.34 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4387: atra śānti-ratiḥ sthāyī samā sāndrā ca sā dvidhā || RBhrs_3,1.35 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4390: līlayā mayi labdhe 'sya babhūvotkampinī tanuḥ || RBhrs_3,1.36 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4401: vilocana-camatkṛtiṃ kathaya kiṃ nu nirmāsyati || RBhrs_3,1.39 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4406: na pratyag-ātmani mano ramate pureva || RBhrs_3,1.40 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4414: mūrdhnā ruddha-dṛg-aśrubhiḥ pulakito drāg eṣa līna-vrataḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4415: akṣṇor aṅganam añjana-tviṣi para-brahmaṇy avāpte mudā
GR14ruphbr_u:4416: mudrābhiḥ prakaṭīkaroty avamatiṃ yogī svarūpa-sthitau || RBhrs_3,1.42 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4418: prathamaṃ jñāna-niṣṭho 'pi so 'traiva ratim udvahet || RBhrs_3,1.43 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4425: eṣa bhakti-rasānanda-nipuṇaḥ syād yathā śukaḥ || RBhrs_3,1.45 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4427: śānty-ākhyāyā rater atra svīkārān na virudhyate || RBhrs_3,1.46 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4429: tan-niṣṭhā durghaṭā buddher etāṃ śānta-ratiṃ vinā || RBhrs_3,1.47 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4432: nāsti yatra sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ na dveṣo na ca matsaraḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4433: samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu sa śāntaḥ prathito rasaḥ || RBhrs_3,1.48 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4437: śāntam eva rasaṃ pūrve prāhur ekam anekadhā || RBhrs_3,1.50 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4438: nirvedo viṣaye sthāyi tattva-jñānodbhavaḥ sa cet |
GR14ruphbr_u:4450: śāntatvenāyam evāddhā sudevādyaiś ca varṇitaḥ || RBhrs_3,2.2 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4452: nītā cetasi bhaktānāṃ prīti-bhakti-raso mataḥ || RBhrs_3,2.3 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4453: anugrāhyasya dāsatvāl lālyatvād apy ayaṃ dvidhā |
GR14ruphbr_u:4454: bhidyate sambhrama-prīto gaurava-prīta ity api || RBhrs_3,2.4 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4458: hariś ca tasya dāsāś ca jñeyā ālambanā iha || RBhrs_3,2.6 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4461: anyatra dvi-bhujaḥ kvāpi kutrāpy eṣu catur-bhujaḥ || RBhrs_3,2.7 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4466: prabhur divi divaukaso bhuvi dhinoti naḥ kiṅkarān || RBhrs_3,2.8 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4474: sakhyenojjvalitais tathā jalajayor āḍhyaś caturbhir bhujaiḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4476: māṃ vyasmārayad eṣa kaṃsa-vijayī vaikuṇṭha-goṣṭhī-śriyam || RBhrs_3,2.10 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4484: vadānyas tejasā yuktaḥ kṛtajñaḥ kīrti-saṃśrayaḥ || RBhrs_3,2.14 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4485: varīyān balavān prema-vaśya ity ādibhir guṇaiḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4486: yutaś catur-vidheṣv eṣa dāseṣv ālambano hariḥ || RBhrs_3,2.15 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4498: rūpaṃ prasiddham evaiṣāṃ tena bhaktir udīryate || RBhrs_3,2.19 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4500: kā paryety ambikeyaṃ harim avakalayan kampate kaḥ śiro 'sau
GR14ruphbr_u:4501: taṃ kaḥ stauty eṣa dhātā praṇamati viluṭhan kaḥ kṣitau vāsavo 'yam |
GR14ruphbr_u:4502: kaḥ stabdho hasyate 'ddhā danujabhid-anujaiḥ pūrvajo 'yaṃ mametthaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:4503: kālindī jāmbavatyāṃ tridaśa-paricayaṃ jāla-randhrād vyatānīt || RBhrs_3,2.20 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4505: te śaraṇyā jñāni-carāḥ sevā-niṣṭhās tridhāśritāḥ || RBhrs_3,2.21 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4507: kecid bhītāḥ śaraṇam abhitaḥ saṃśrayante bhavantaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:4509: śrāvaṃ śrāvaṃ tava nava-navāṃ mādhurīṃ sādhu-vṛndād
GR14ruphbr_u:4510: vṛndāraṇyotsava kila vayaṃ deva sevemahi tvām || RBhrs_3,2.22 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4519: kāmādīnāṃ kati na katidhā pālitā durnideśās
GR14ruphbr_u:4520: teṣāṃ jātā mayi na karuṇā na trapā nopaśāntiḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4522: tvām āyātaḥ śaraṇam abhayaṃ māṃ niyuṅkṣvātma-dāsye || RBhrs_3,2.25 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4524: ye mumukṣāṃ parityajya harim eva samāśritāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4525: śaunaka-pramukhās te tu proktā jñāni-carāḥ budhaiḥ || RBhrs_3,2.26 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4530: kṛtādya no yena kṛśā mumukṣā || RBhrs_3,2.27 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4532: dhyānātītaṃ kim api paramaṃ ye tu jānanti tattvaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:4539: ikṣvākuḥ śrutadevāś ca puṇḍarīkādayaś ca te || RBhrs_3,2.29 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4542: śūnyodyāne nayati vihagān apy alaṃ bhikṣu-caryām |
GR14ruphbr_u:4543: ity utkarṣaṃ kam api sa-camatkāram ākarṇya citraṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:4544: sevāyāṃ te sphuṭam aghahara śraddhayā gardhito 'smi || RBhrs_3,2.30 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4546: uddhavo dāruko jaitraḥ śrutadevaś ca śatrujit |
GR14ruphbr_u:4549: tathāpi kvāpy avasare paricaryāṃ ca kurvate |
GR14ruphbr_u:4560: dvāri dvāravatī-purasya purataḥ sevotsukas tiṣṭhati || RBhrs_3,2.34 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4561: eteṣāṃ pravaraḥ śrīmān uddhavaḥ prema-viklavaḥ || RBhrs_3,2.35 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4566: mukhyaṃ pāriṣadeṣu bhakti-laharī-ruddhaṃ bhajāmy uddhavam || RBhrs_3,2.36 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4570: mantraṃ pṛcchati mām apeśala-dhiyaṃ vijñāna-vārāṃ nidhir
GR14ruphbr_u:4571: vikrīḍaty asakṛd vicitra-caritaḥ so 'yaṃ prabhur mādṛśām || RBhrs_3,2.37 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4574: purasthāś ca vrajasthāś cety ucyate anugā dvidhā || RBhrs_3,2.38 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4586: ānandaś candrahāsaś ca payodo vakulas tathā |
GR14ruphbr_u:4587: rasadaḥ śāradādyāś ca vrajasthā anugā matāḥ || RBhrs_3,2.42 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4595: varair agurubhir jalaṃ racaya vāsitaṃ vārida |
GR14ruphbr_u:4597: parāga-paṭalī gavāṃ diśam arundha paurandarīm || RBhrs_3,2.44 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4598: vrajānugeṣu sarveṣu varīyān raktako mataḥ || RBhrs_3,2.45 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4609: dhūryo dhīraś ca vīraś ca tridhā pāriṣad-ādikaḥ || RBhrs_3,2.48 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4612: yaḥ prītiṃ tanute bhaktaḥ sa dhūrya iha kīrtyate || RBhrs_3,2.49 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4614: devaḥ sevyatayā yathā sphurati me devyas tathāsya priyāḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:4616: smṛtvā sāhasikaṃ bibhemi tam ahaṃ bhaktābhimānonnataṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:4617: prītiṃ tat-praṇate khare 'py avidadhad yaḥ svāsthyam ālambate || RBhrs_3,2.50 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4620: tasya prasāda-pātraṃ syān mukhyaṃ dhīraḥ sa ucyate || RBhrs_3,2.51 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4627: kṛpāṃ tasya samāśritya prauḍhāṃ nānyam apekṣate |
GR14ruphbr_u:4628: atulāṃ yo vahan kṛṣṇe prītiṃ vīraḥ sa ucyate || RBhrs_3,2.53 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4630: pralamba-ripur īśvaro bhavatu kā kṛtis tena me
GR14ruphbr_u:4631: kumāra-makara-dhvajād api na kiñcid āste phalam |
GR14ruphbr_u:4633: priyā pariṣad-agrimāṃ na gaṇayāmi bhāmām api || RBhrs_3,2.54 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4638: sva eva dhiṣṇye 'bhiratasya kiṃ tayā || RBhrs_3,2.55 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4640: nitya-siddhāś ca siddhāś ca sādhakāḥ parikīrtitaḥ || RBhrs_3,2.56 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4644: ity ādayo vibhāvāḥ syur eṣv asādhāraṇā matāḥ || RBhrs_3,2.57 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4646: kṛṣṇasya paśyata kṛpāṃ kṛpādyāḥ kṛpaṇe mayi |
GR14ruphbr_u:4647: dhyeyo 'sau nidhane hanta dṛśor adhvānam abhyagāt || RBhrs_3,2.58 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4650: tad-aṅga-saurabhādyās tu sarvaiḥ sādhāraṇā matāḥ || RBhrs_3,2.59 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4654: citraṃ vāri-dharān vināpi tarasā yair adya dhārā-mayair
GR14ruphbr_u:4655: dūrāt paśyata deva-mātṛkam abhūd vṛndāṭavī-maṇḍalam || RBhrs_3,2.60 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4659: tan-niṣṭhādyāḥ śītāḥ syur eṣv asādhāraṇāḥ kriyāḥ || RBhrs_3,2.61 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4666: virāgādyāś ca ye śītāḥ proktāḥ sādhāraṇās tu te || RBhrs_3,2.63 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4669: natvā munīṃś ca saṃhṛṣṭo dhunvan vāso nanarta ha || RBhrs_3,2.64 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4676: stambhādyāḥ sāttvikāḥ sarve prītādi-tritaye matāḥ || RBhrs_3,2.66 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4689: dainyaṃ cintā smṛtiḥ śaṅkā matir autsukya-cāpale || RBhrs_3,2.69 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4691: bodhaḥ svapnaḥ klamo vyādhir mṛtiś ca vyabhicāriṇaḥ || RBhrs_3,2.70 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4693: yoge trayaḥ syur dhṛty-antā ayoge tu klamādayaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4694: ubhayatra pare śeṣā nirvedādyāḥ satāṃ matāḥ || RBhrs_3,2.71 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4705: ādhis tad-virahe deva grīṣme sara ivāṃśumān || RBhrs_3,2.74 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4707: dhanyāḥ sphurati tava sūrya karāḥ sahasraṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:4710: dūre muhūrtam api yā na vilokate tam || RBhrs_3,2.75 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4714: eṣā rase 'tra kathitā sthāyi-bhāvatayā budhaiḥ || RBhrs_3,2.76 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4716: tatra pāriṣadādes tu hetuḥ saṃskāra eva hi |
GR14ruphbr_u:4719: vṛddhiṃ premā tataḥ snehas tato rāga iti tridhā || RBhrs_3,2.78 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4721: mamādyāmaṅgalaṃ naṣṭaṃ phalavāṃś caiva me bhavaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4725: kadā namaskariṣāmi gopa-rūpaṃ tam īśvaram || RBhrs_3,2.80 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4731: naya māṃ vikṛtir na hi me tvat-pada-kamalāvalambasya || RBhrs_3,2.82 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4736: arajyata sa mayy aho dviguṇam eva vairocaniḥ || RBhrs_3,2.83 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4738: sāndraś citta-dravaṃ kurvan premā sneha itīryate |
GR14ruphbr_u:4739: kṣaṇikasyāpi neha syād visleṣasya sahiṣṇutā || RBhrs_3,2.84 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4744: citrā na te dāruka dāru-kalpatā || RBhrs_3,2.85 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4746: patnīṃ ratna-nidheḥ parām upaharan pūreṇa bāṣpāmbhasāṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:4749: stabdho 'py abhyadhikāṃ śriyaṃ praṇamatāṃ vṛndād dadhāroddhavaḥ || RBhrs_3,2.86 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4751: snehaḥ sa rāgo yena syāt sukhaṃ duḥkham api sphuṭam |
GR14ruphbr_u:4752: tat-sambandha-lave 'py atra prītiḥ prāṇa-vyayair api || RBhrs_3,2.87 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4754: gurur api bhujagād bhīs takṣakāt prājya-rājya-
GR14ruphbr_u:4755: cyutir atiśayinī ca prāya-caryā ca gurvī |
GR14ruphbr_u:4763: prāya ādya-dvaye premā snehaḥ pāriṣadeṣv asau |
GR14ruphbr_u:4764: parīkṣiti bhaved-rāgo dāruke ca tathoddhave || RBhrs_3,2.90 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4766: asminn abhyudite bhāvaḥ prāyaḥ syāt sakhya-leśa-bhāk || RBhrs_3,2.91 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4770: ayoga-yogāv etasya prabhedau kathitāv ubhau || RBhrs_3,2.93 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4772: saṅgābhāvo harer dhīrair ayoga iti kathyate |
GR14ruphbr_u:4775: utkaṇṭhitaṃ viyogaś cety ayoge 'pi dvidhocyate || RBhrs_3,2.95 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4780: pakṣapātena tan-nāmni mṛge padme ca tad-dṛśi || RBhrs_3,2.97 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4785: mahyaṃ na na syāt phalam añjasā dṛśaḥ || RBhrs_3,2.98 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4793: hā hanta hā hanta kathaṃ nayāmi || RBhrs_3,2.100 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4797: mano mama manāg api kvacid anāpnuvan nirvṛtiṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:4798: kṣaṇārdham api manyate vraja-mahendra varṣa-vrajam || RBhrs_3,2.101 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4799: dainyaṃ, yathā tatraiva {*Karṇāmṛta? Not found in any of the three centuries.}--
GR14ruphbr_u:4806: laghur aghahara kīṭād apy ahaṃ kūṭa-karmā |
GR14ruphbr_u:4812: bhaven na hi yayoḥ padaṃ madhurima-śriyām āspadaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:4813: padāmbujanakhāṅkurād api visāri rocis tava || RBhrs_3,2.104 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4818: hari hari niḥśvasato niśāḥ prayāti || RBhrs_3,2.105 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4821: mac-cāpalaṃ ca tava vā mama vādhigamyam |
GR14ruphbr_u:4831: kṛṣṇa-graha-gṛhītātmā na veda jagad īdṛśam || RBhrs_3,2.108 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4834: tanuṃ bibhrad bhavyaḥ pratikṛtir ivāste dvija-patiḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4836: puraḥ śyāmāmbhode bata vinihitā dṛṣṭir amunā || RBhrs_3,2.109 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4838: nadati kvacid utkaṇṭho vilajjo nṛtyati kvacit |
GR14ruphbr_u:4841: kvacin naṭati niṣpaṭaṃ kvacid asambhavaṃ stambhate
GR14ruphbr_u:4842: kvacid vihasati sphuṭaṃ kvacid amandam ākrandati |
GR14ruphbr_u:4843: lasaty analasaṃ kvacit kvacid apārtham ārtāyate
GR14ruphbr_u:4854: kṣipata nanu satīrthāś ceṣṭatāṃ prāṇa-haṃsaḥ || RBhrs_3,2.113 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4863: adhṛtir jaḍatā vyādhir unmādo mūrcchitaṃ budhaiḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4866: arāgitā tu sarvasminn adhṛtiḥ kathitā budhaiḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4867: anye 'ṣṭau prakaṭārthatvāt tāpādyā na hi lakṣitāḥ || RBhrs_3,2.117 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4872: taṃ smārayan munipate dahatīha sabhyān || RBhrs_3,2.118 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4880: kṣaṇadāḥ kṣaṇa-dāyitojjhitā bahulāśve bahulās tadābhavan || RBhrs_3,2.120 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4883: na kila kuṭumbam ihāsti nas trilokyām |
GR14ruphbr_u:4885: kvacid api na vyavatiṣṭhate 'dya cetaḥ || RBhrs_3,2.121 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4894: svedāśrubhir na hi paraṃ jalatām avāpur
GR14ruphbr_u:4909: vraja-bhuvi tathā nāsīn nidrā-lavo 'pi yathā purā |
GR14ruphbr_u:4911: satatam adhunā niśceṣṭāṅgās taṭāny adhiśerate || RBhrs_3,2.126 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4916: na kila vasatim ārtāḥ kartum icchanti haṃsāḥ || RBhrs_3,2.127 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4917: aśivatvān na ghaṭate bhakte kutrāpy asau mṛtiḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:4920: kṛṣṇena saṅgamo yas tu sa yoga iti kīrtyate |
GR14ruphbr_u:4921: yoge 'pi kathitaḥ siddhis tuṣṭiḥ sthitir iti tridhā || RBhrs_3,2.129 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4923: utkaṇṭhite hareḥ prāptiḥ siddhir ity abhidhīyate || RBhrs_3,2.130 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4928: mandaṃ mandam aye ka eṣa mathurā-vīthīṃ mitho gāhate || RBhrs_3,2.131 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4933: jāte viyoge kaṃsāreḥ samprāptis tuṣṭir ucyate || RBhrs_3,2.133 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4941: dāruko dvārakā-dvāri tatra citra-daśāṃ yayau || RBhrs_3,2.135 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4943: saha-vāso mukundena sthitir nigaditā budhaiḥ || RBhrs_3,2.136 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4945: {*This actually appears to be a mix of verses 50-51. Check my comment in Mystic Poetry.}--
GR14ruphbr_u:4951: puras tasya niveśādyā yoge 'mīṣāṃ kriyā matāḥ || RBhrs_3,2.138 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4953: bhavatvam eva niścitya na rasāvasthatāṃ jaguḥ || RBhrs_3,2.139 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4954: iti tāvad asādhīyo yat purāṇeṣu keṣucit |
GR14ruphbr_u:4955: śrīmad-bhāgavate caiṣa prakaṭo dṛśyate rasaḥ || RBhrs_3,2.140 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4960: bhavanti tūṣṇīṃ param etya nirvṛtāḥ || RBhrs_3,2.141 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4967: kintu kālādi-vaiśiṣṭyāt kvacit syāt sīma-laṅghanam || RBhrs_3,2.143 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4970: sā vibhāvādibhiḥ puṣṭā gaurava-prītir ucyate || RBhrs_3,2.144 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4972: hariś ca tasya lālyāś ca bhavanty ālambanā iha || RBhrs_3,2.145 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4977: hitam iha nijayāgre ceṣṭayaivātmajān naḥ || RBhrs_3,2.146 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4979: rakṣī lālaka ity ādyair guṇair ālambano hariḥ || RBhrs_3,2.147 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4992: ghrātāś ca mūrdhni parirabhya bhavanty adasrāḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:4993: sāmbādayaḥ kati purā vidadhus tapāṃsi || RBhrs_3,2.150 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4994: rukmiṇī-nandanas teṣu lālyeṣu pravaro mataḥ || RBhrs_3,2.151 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:4997: janayati janeṣu janaka-bhrāntiṃ yaḥ suṣṭhu rūpeṇa || RBhrs_3,2.152 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5000: sa eṣa paramo gurur garuḍa-go yadūnāṃ patiḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5001: yataḥ kim api lālanaṃ vayam avāpya daroddhurāḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:5002: purārim api saṅgare guru-ruṣaṃ tiraskurmahe || RBhrs_3,2.153 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5005: lālyānāṃ tu sva-sambandha-sphūrter eva samantataḥ || RBhrs_3,2.154 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5021: bhuvam abhi makarāṅko rāṅkavaṃ svīcakāra || RBhrs_3,2.159 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5029: dvandve dṛśoḥ padam asau kila niṣprakampā |
GR14ruphbr_u:5038: naṭaiś ca hṛṣyadbhir akāri nṛtyam || RBhrs_3,2.164 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5040: dhanyaḥ sāmba bhavān sa-riṅgaṇam ayan pārśve rajaḥ-karbūro
GR14ruphbr_u:5041: yas tātena vikṛṣya vatsalatayā svotsaṅgam āropitaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5042: dhiṅ māṃ durbhagam atra śaṅkara-mayair durdaiva-visphūrjitaiḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:5043: prāptā na kṣaṇikāpi lālana-ratiḥ sā yena bālye pituḥ || RBhrs_3,2.165 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5046: tanmayī lālake prītir gaurava-prītir ucyate || RBhrs_3,2.166 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5047: sthāyi-bhāvo 'tra sā caiṣām āmūlāt svayam ucchritā |
GR14ruphbr_u:5048: kañcid viśeṣam āpannā premeti sneha ity api |
GR14ruphbr_u:5049: rāga ity ucyate cātra gaurava-prītir eva sā || RBhrs_3,2.167 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5053: dhīraḥ paraṃ kim api saṅkucatīṃ jhaṣāṅko
GR14ruphbr_u:5057: karād ākṛṣyaiva prasabham abhimanyāv api hate |
GR14ruphbr_u:5059: prapede kalyāṇī na hi malinimānaṃ lavam api || RBhrs_3,2.169 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5064: nidhehi savidhe pituḥ kathaya vatsa kaḥ sambhramaḥ || RBhrs_3,2.170 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5069: viṣam iva tāṃ tu sudhāṃ sa eva sadyaḥ || RBhrs_3,2.171 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5070: triṣv evāyoga-yogādyā bhedāḥ pūrvavad īritāḥ || RBhrs_3,2.172 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5082: militaḥ śambara-purato madanaḥ purato vilokayan pitaram |
GR14ruphbr_u:5083: ko 'ham iti svaṃ pramadān na dhīr adhīr apy asau veda || RBhrs_3,2.175 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5086: ajani mudā yadu-nagare sambhrama-bhūmā kumārāṇām || RBhrs_3,2.176 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5089: vandate pādayor dvandvaṃ pituḥ prati-dinaṃ smaraḥ || RBhrs_3,2.177 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5090: utkaṇṭhita-viyogādye yad yad vistāritaṃ na hi |
GR14ruphbr_u:5091: sambhrama-prītivaj jñeyaṃ tat tad evākhilaṃ budhaiḥ || RBhrs_3,2.178 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5099: nītaś citte satāṃ puṣṭiṃ rasaḥ preyān udīryate || RBhrs_3,3.1 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5101: hariś ca tad-vayasyāś ca tasminn ālambanā matāḥ || RBhrs_3,3.2 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5103: dvibhujatvādi-bhāg atra prāgvad ālambano hariḥ || RBhrs_3,3.3 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5108: vrajād aghaharo haraty ahaha naḥ sakhīnāṃ manaḥ || RBhrs_3,3.4 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5111: sakhyenojjvalitais tathā jalajayor āḍhyaṃ caturbhir bhujaiḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5118: sukhī varīyān ity ādyā guṇās tasyeha kīrtitā || RBhrs_3,3.7 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5127: te pura-vraja-sambandhād dvi-vidhāḥ prāya īritāḥ || RBhrs_3,3.10 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5129: arjuno bhīmasenaś ca duhitā drupadasya ca |
GR14ruphbr_u:5132: śirasi nṛpatir drag aghrāsīd aghārim adhīra-dhīr
GR14ruphbr_u:5135: tam avaśādhiyaḥ prauḍhānandād arundhata pāṇḍavāḥ || RBhrs_3,3.12 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5150: ataḥ sarva-vayasyeṣu pradhānatvaṃ bhajanty amī || RBhrs_3,3.16 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5155: sadā praṇaya-śālinaḥ sahacarā hareḥ pāntu vaḥ || RBhrs_3,3.17 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5157: unnidrasya yayus tavātra viratiṃ sapta-kṣapās tiṣṭhato
GR14ruphbr_u:5158: hanta śrānta ivāsi nikṣipa sakhe śrīdāma-pāṇau girim |
GR14ruphbr_u:5159: ādhir vidhyati nas tvam arpaya kare kiṃ vā kṣaṇaṃ dakṣiṇe
GR14ruphbr_u:5160: doṣṇas te karavāma kāmam adhunā savyasya saṃvāhanam || RBhrs_3,3.18 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5170: kṣaṇam aham avasīdan śūnya-cittas tadāsam || RBhrs_3,3.20 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5171: suhṛdaś ca sakhāyaś ca tathā priya-sakhāḥ pare |
GR14ruphbr_u:5172: priya-narma-vayasyāś cety uktā goṣṭhe catur-vidhāḥ || RBhrs_3,3.21 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5175: sāyudhās tasya duṣṭebhyaḥ sadā rakṣā-parāyaṇāḥ || RBhrs_3,3.22 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5178: vijayo balabhadrādyāḥ suhṛdas tasya kīrtitāḥ || RBhrs_3,3.23 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5180: dhunvan dhāvasi maṇḍalāgram amalaṃ tvaṃ maṇḍalībhadra kiṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:5181: gurvīṃ nārya gadāṃ gṛhāṇa vijaya kṣobhaṃ vṛthā mā kṛthāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5182: śaktiṃ na kṣipa bhadravardhana puro govardhanaṃ gāhate
GR14ruphbr_u:5183: garjann eṣa ghano balī na tu balīvardākṛtir dānavaḥ || RBhrs_3,3.24 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5190: sukhaṃ svapitu naḥ suhṛd vraja-niśānta-madhye niśi |
GR14ruphbr_u:5191: ahaṃ śirasi mardanaṃ mṛdu karomi karṇe kathāṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:5192: tvam asya visṛjann alaṃ subala sakthinī lālaya || RBhrs_3,3.27 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5201: iti subala girā me sandiśa tvaṃ mukundaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:5212: yad ugra-bhuja-saṅgare gurum agāt klamaṃ naḥ sakhā || RBhrs_3,3.32 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5213: sarveṣu sakhiṣu śreṣṭho devaprastho 'yam īritaḥ || RBhrs_3,3.33 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5220: śrīdāmnaḥ pṛthulāṃ bhujām abhi śiro vinyasya viśrāmiṇaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:5222: madhye sundari kandarasya padayoḥ saṃvāhanena priyaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:5223: devaprastha itaḥ kṛtī sukhayati premṇā vrajendrātmajam || RBhrs_3,3.35 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5226: śrīdāmā ca sudāmā ca dāmā ca vasudāmakaḥ || RBhrs_3,3.36 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5233: prasārya bhujayor yugaṃ pulaki kaścid āśliṣyati |
GR14ruphbr_u:5234: kareṇa calatā dṛśau nibhṛtam etya rundhe paraḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:5235: kṛśāṅgi sukhayanty amī priya-sakhāḥ sakhāyaṃ tava || RBhrs_3,3.39 ||

GR14ruphbr_u:5328: pārśvādy-aṅgaṃ suvalitaṃ paugaṇḍe sati madhyame || RBhrs_3,3.67 ||

GR14ruphbr_u:5367: kaiśoraṃ pūrvam evoktaṃ saṅkṣepeṇocyate tataḥ || RBhrs_3,3.78 ||

GR14ruphbr_u:5382: api nivahāḥ samam eva jāgrati sma || RBhrs_3,3.82 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5390: pañcāsya paśya muditāḥ pañcāsya-pratimāṃ yayuḥ || RBhrs_3,3.84 ||

GR14ruphbr_u:5459: vimukta-sambhramā yā syād viśrambhātmā ratir dvayoḥ |

GR14ruphbr_u:5462: eṣā sakhya-ratir vṛddhiṃ gacchantī praṇayaḥ kramāt |

GR14ruphbr_u:5506: atrāpi pūrvavat proktās tāpādyās tā daśā daśa || RBhrs_3,3.117 ||

GR14ruphbr_u:5536: sphurati suhṛdāṃ gaṇāḥ śikhara-jāta-vṛkṣā iva || RBhrs_3,3.123 ||

GR14ruphbr_u:5671: paṭṭa-ḍorī kaṭau haste sūtram ity ādi maṇḍanam || RBhrs_3,4.23 ||

GR14ruphbr_u:5686: kiṅkiṇy-ādi ca kaṭyādau prasādhanam ihoditam || RBhrs_3,4.27 ||

GR14ruphbr_u:5729: mātuḥ pramoda-bharam eva haris tanoti || RBhrs_3,4.39 ||

GR14ruphbr_u:5734: trasyal-locanam asya śuṣyad-adharaṃ ramyaṃ didṛkṣe mukham || RBhrs_3,4.40 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5743: ghrāṇair avāpuḥ paramāṃ mudaṃ te || RBhrs_3,4.42 ||

GR14ruphbr_u:5757: matvā paraṃ brahma sutān apāyayan || RBhrs_3,4.46 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5762: tava navam abhiṣekaṃ dugdha-pūraiḥ karoti || RBhrs_3,4.47 ||

GR14ruphbr_u:5766: na ca sutam upadeṣṭuṃ ruddha-kaṇṭhī samarthā
GR14ruphbr_u:5767: dadhatam acalam āsīd vyākulā gokuleśā || RBhrs_3,4.48 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5780: ratiḥ saivātra vātsalyaṃ sthāyī bhāvo nigadyate || RBhrs_3,4.52 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5782: premavat snehavad bhāti kadācit kila rāgavat || RBhrs_3,4.53 ||

GR14ruphbr_u:5789: gehād aṅganam aṅganāt punar asau gehaṃ viśanty ākulā
GR14ruphbr_u:5790: govindasya muhur vrajendra-gṛhiṇī panthānam ālokate || RBhrs_3,4.55 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5800: premā vallava-nāthayor atitarām ullāsam evāyayau || RBhrs_3,4.57 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5805: vṛttāsi vraja-rājñi tat-suta-mukha-prekṣāṃ sphuṭaṃ vāñchasi || RBhrs_3,4.58 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5810: sthitā yadi na tatra te vadana-padmam udvīkṣyate || RBhrs_3,4.59 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5826: paśya srasta-tanuḥ kaṭhora-luṭhanair dehe vraṇaṃ kurvatī |

GR14ruphbr_u:5828: krośantī karayor yugena kurute kaṣṭād uras-tāḍanam || RBhrs_3,4.63 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5829: bahūnām api sad-bhāve viyoge 'tra tu kecana |
GR14ruphbr_u:5831: unmāda-mohāv ity ādyā atyudrekaṃ vrajanty amī || RBhrs_3,4.64 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5833: manda-spandam abhūt klamair alaghubhiḥ sandānitaṃ mānasaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:5835: niśvāsaiḥ sravad eva pākam ayate stanyaṃ ca taptair idaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:5841: śirasi kuliśaṃ hanta kṣiptaṃ śvaphalka-sutena me || RBhrs_3,4.66 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5843: dhig astu hata-jīvitaṃ niravadhi-śriyo 'py adya me
GR14ruphbr_u:5844: yayā na hi hareḥ śiraḥ snuta-kucāgram āghrāyate |
GR14ruphbr_u:5845: sadā nava-sudhā-duhām api gavāṃ parārdhaṃ ca dhik
GR14ruphbr_u:5846: sa luñcati na cañcalaḥ surabhi-gandhi yāsāṃ dadhi || RBhrs_3,4.67 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5858: kim iva kurute harmye tiṣṭhann ayaṃ nirapatrapo
GR14ruphbr_u:5859: vrajapatir iti brūte mugdho 'yam atra mudā janaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5860: ahaha tanayaṃ prāṇebhyo 'pi priyaṃ parihṛtya taṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:5861: kaṭhina-hṛdayo goṣṭhe svairī praviśya sukhīyati || RBhrs_3,4.70 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5863: kva me putro nīpāḥ kathayata kuraṅgāḥ kim iha vaḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:5864: sa babhrāmābhyarṇe bhaṇata tam udantaṃ madhukarāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5866: bhavantaṃ pṛcchantī diśi diśi yaśodā vicarati || RBhrs_3,4.71 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5868: kuṭumbini manas taṭe vidhuratāṃ vidhatse kathaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:5869: prasāraya dṛśaṃ manāk tava sutaḥ puro vartate |
GR14ruphbr_u:5870: idaṃ gṛhiṇi gṛhaṃ na kuru śūnyam ity ākulaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:5871: sa śocati tava prasūṃ yadu-kulendra nandaḥ pitā || RBhrs_3,4.72 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5889: tava muhur atiharṣād varṣati kṣīra-dhārām || RBhrs_3,4.76 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5890: svīkurvate rasam imaṃ nāṭya-jñā api kecana || RBhrs_3,4.77 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5892: sphuṭaṃ camatkāritayā vatsalaṃ ca rasaṃ viduḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5896: preyasas tu tirobhāvo vatsalaysāsya na kṣatiḥ || RBhrs_3,4.79 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5898: tatra keṣucid apy asyāḥ saṅkulatvam udīryate || RBhrs_3,4.80 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5900: yudhiṣṭhirasya vātsalyaṃ prītyā sakhyena cānvitam || RBhrs_3,4.81 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5906: evaṃ keṣucid anyeṣu vijñeyaṃ bhāva-miśraṇam || RBhrs_3,4.84 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5913: ātmocitair vibhāvādyaiḥ puṣṭiṃ nītā satāṃ hṛdi |
GR14ruphbr_u:5914: madhurākhyo bhaved bhakti-raso 'sau madhurā ratiḥ || RBhrs_3,5.1 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5916: rahasyatvāc ca saṃkṣipya vitatāṇgo vilikhyate || RBhrs_3,5.2 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5918: asmin ālambanaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ priyās tasya tu subhruvaḥ || RBhrs_3,5.3 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5921: āśrayatvena madhure harir ālambano mataḥ || RBhrs_3,5.4 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5926: śṛṅgāraḥ sakhi mūrtimān iva madhau mugdho hariḥ krīḍati || RBhrs_3,5.5 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5932: preyasīṣu harer āsu pravarā vārṣabhānavī || RBhrs_3,5.7 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5941: rādhā lāghavam apy anādara-girāṃ bhaṅgībhir ātanvatī
GR14ruphbr_u:5942: maitrī-gauravato 'py asau śata-guṇāṃ mat-prītim evādadhe || RBhrs_3,5.9 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5945: rādhām ādhāya hṛdaye tatyāja vraja-sundarīḥ || RBhrs_3,5.10 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5959: krāntvā sapta jaganti samprati vayaṃ sarvordhvam adhyāsmahe || RBhrs_3,5.14 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5966: ālasyaugrye vinā sarve vijñeyā vyabhicāriṇaḥ || RBhrs_3,5.16 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5971: nālambituṃ katham api kṣamate 'dya jīvaḥ || RBhrs_3,5.17 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5978: sthāyī bhāvo bhavaty atra pūrvoktā madhurā ratiḥ || RBhrs_3,5.19 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5984: rādhā-mādhavayor eva kvāpi bhāvaiḥ kadāpy asau |
GR14ruphbr_u:5987: ito dūre rājñī sphurati parito mitra-paṭalī
GR14ruphbr_u:5988: dṛśor agre candrāvalir upari śailasya danujaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:5990: anta-śrīr lolā taḍid iva mukundasya valate || RBhrs_3,5.22 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5991: ghorā khaṇḍita-śaṅkhacūḍam ajiraṃ rundhe śivā tāmasī
GR14ruphbr_u:5994: rādhāyās tad api praphullam abhajan mlāniṃ na bhāvāmbujam || RBhrs_3,5.23 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:5997: sa pūrva-rāgo mānaś ca pravāsādi-mayas tathā |
GR14ruphbr_u:5998: vipralambho bahu-vidho vidvadbhir iha kathyate || RBhrs_3,5.25 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6000: prāg-asaṅgatayor bhāvaḥ pūrva-rāgo bhaved dvayoḥ || RBhrs_3,5.26 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6002: akasmād ekasmin pathi sakhi mayā yāmuna-taṭaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:6004: sa dṛg-bhaṅgyā kiṃ vākuruta na hi jāne tata idaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:6005: mano me vyālolaṃ kvacana gṛha-kṛtyo na lagate || RBhrs_3,5.27 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6007: yathā vinidrā yac cittā rukmiṇī kamalekṣaṇā |
GR14ruphbr_u:6008: tathāham api tac-citto nidrāṃ ca na labhe niśi |
GR14ruphbr_u:6009: vedāhaṃ rukmiṇyā dveṣān mamodvāho nivāritaḥ || RBhrs_3,5.28 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6016: mukhara-nikhare līnā dīnāpy uvāca rahaḥ sakhīm || RBhrs_3,5.30 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6026: na bhuṅkte na svapiti ca cintayan vo hy aharniśam || RBhrs_3,5.33 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6028: dvayor militayor bhogaḥ sambhoga iti kīrtyate || RBhrs_3,5.34 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6048: tanutāṃ sanātanātmā bhagavān mayi sarvadā tuṣṭim || RBhrs_4,1.1 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6050: rasaḥ sapta-vidho gauṇo maitrī-vaira-sthitir mithaḥ || RBhrs_4,1.2 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6051: rasābhāsāś ca tenātra laharyo nava kīrtitāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:6052: prāg atrāniyatādhārāḥ kadācit kvāpy uditvarāḥ || RBhrs_4,1.3 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6053: gauṇā bhakti-rasāḥ sapta lekhyā hāsyādayaḥ kramāt || RBhrs_4,1.4 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6054: bhaktānāṃ pañcadhoktānām eṣāṃ madhyata eva hi |
GR14ruphbr_u:6055: kvāpy ekaḥ kvāpy anekaś ca gauṇeṣv ālambano mataḥ || RBhrs_4,1.5 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6058: hāsya-bhakti-raso nāma budhair eṣa nigadyate || RBhrs_4,1.6 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6060: vṛddhāḥ śiśu-mukhāḥ prāyaḥ proktā dhīrais tad-āśrayāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:6061: vibhāvanādi-vaiśiṣṭyāt pravarāś ca kvacin matāḥ || RBhrs_4,1.7 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6063: yāsyāmy asya na bhīṣaṇasya savidhaṃ jīrṇasya śīrṇākṛter
GR14ruphbr_u:6064: mātar neṣyati māṃ pidhāya kapaṭād ādhārikāyām asau |
GR14ruphbr_u:6065: ity uktvā cakitākṣam adbhuta-śiśāv udvīkṣyamāṇe harau
GR14ruphbr_u:6066: hāsyaṃ tasya niruddhato 'py atitarāṃ vyaktaṃ tadāsīn muneḥ || RBhrs_4,1.8 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6068: yac ceṣṭā kṛṣṇa-viṣayā proktaḥ so 'tra tad-anvayī || RBhrs_4,1.9 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6070: dadāmi dadhi-phāṇitaṃ vivṛṇu vaktram ity agrato
GR14ruphbr_u:6072: tayā kusumam arpitaṃ navam avetya bhugnānane
GR14ruphbr_u:6073: harau jahasur uddhuraṃ kim api suṣṭhu goṣṭhārbhakāḥ || RBhrs_4,1.10 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6075: asya prekṣya karaṃ śiśor munipate śyāmasya me kathyatāṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:6076: tathyaṃ hanta cirāyur eṣa bhavitā kiṃ dhenu-koṭīśvaraḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:6077: ity ukte bhagavan mayādya paritaś cīreṇa kiṃ cāruṇā
GR14ruphbr_u:6078: drāg āvirbhavad-uddhura-smitam idaṃ vaktraṃ tvayā rudhyate || RBhrs_4,1.11 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6083: ṣoḍhā hāsa-ratiḥ syāt smita-hasite vihasitāvahasite ca |
GR14ruphbr_u:6084: apahasitātihasitake jyeṣṭhādīnāṃ kramād dve dve || RBhrs_4,1.14 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6086: bhaved vihasitādyaṃ ca bhāvajñair iti bhaṇyate || RBhrs_4,1.15 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6090: kva yāmi jaratī khalā dadhi-haraṃ didhīrṣanty asau
GR14ruphbr_u:6091: pradhāvati javena māṃ subala maṅkṣu rakṣāṃ kuru |
GR14ruphbr_u:6093: vikasvara-mukhāmbujaṃ kulam abhūn munīnāṃ divi || RBhrs_4,1.17 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6095: tad eva dara-saṃlakṣya-dantāgraṃ hasitaṃ bhavet || RBhrs_4,1.18 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6097: mad-vaśena puraḥ-sthito harir asau putro 'ham evāsmi te
GR14ruphbr_u:6099: mām eti skhalad-akṣare jaṭilayā vyākruśya niṣkāsite
GR14ruphbr_u:6100: putre prāṅgataḥ sakhī-kulam abhūd dantāṃśu-dhautādharam || RBhrs_4,1.19 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6102: sa-svanaṃ dṛṣṭa-daśanaṃ bhaved vihasitaṃ tu tat || RBhrs_4,1.20 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6104: muṣāṇa dadhi meduraṃ viphalam antarā śaṅkase
GR14ruphbr_u:6107: kṛtaṃ hasitam utsvanaṃ kapaṭa-suptayā vṛddhayā || RBhrs_4,1.21 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6111: lagnas te nitarāṃ dṛśor api yuge kiṃ dhātu-rāgo ghanaḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:6112: prātaḥ putra balasya vā kim asitaṃ vāsas tvayāṅge dhṛtam |
GR14ruphbr_u:6114: dūtī saṅkucad-īkṣaṇāvahasitaṃ jātā na roddhuṃ kṣamā || RBhrs_4,1.23 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6121: jaratyāḥ prastobhān naṭati tad anaiṣīd dṛśam asau || RBhrs_4,1.25 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6123: sahasra-tālaṃ kṣiptāṅgaṃ tac cātihasitaṃ viduḥ || RBhrs_4,1.26 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6125: vṛddhe tvaṃ valitānanāsi valibhiḥ prekṣya suyogyām atas
GR14ruphbr_u:6126: tvām udvoḍhum asau balī-mukha-varo māṃ sādhayaty utsukaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:6127: ābhir vipluta-dhīr vṛṇe na hi paraṃ tvatto bali-dhvaṃsanād
GR14ruphbr_u:6128: ity uccair mukharā-girā vijahasuḥ sottālikā bālikāḥ || RBhrs_4,1.27 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6129: yasya hāsaḥ sa cet kvāpi sākṣān naiva nibadhyate |
GR14ruphbr_u:6134: kā tvattaḥ kuṭile parāsti jaṭilā-putri kṣitau sundarī
GR14ruphbr_u:6135: puṇyena vraja-subhruvāṃ tava dhṛtiṃ hartuṃ na vaṃśī kṣamā || RBhrs_4,1.29 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6145: sā vismaya-ratir nītād- bhuto-bhakti-raso bhavet || RBhrs_4,2.1 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6152: sākṣād anumitaṃ ceti tac ca dvividham ucyate || RBhrs_4,2.4 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6161: citraṃ bataitad ekena vapuṣā yugapat pṛthak |
GR14ruphbr_u:6162: gṛheṣu dvy-aṣṭa-sāhasraṃ striya eka udāvahat || RBhrs_4,2.7 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6167: khelann iva sphurati hanta kim indra-jālam || RBhrs_4,2.8 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6169: yāny akṣipan praharaṇāni bhaṭāḥ sa devaḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:6175: vatsāś ceti vadan kṛto 'smi vivaśaḥ stambha-śriyā paśyata |
GR14ruphbr_u:6176: āścaryaṃ kathayāmi vaḥ śṛṇuta bhoḥ pratyekam ekaikaśaḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:6177: stūyante jagad-aṇḍavadbhir abhitas te hanta padmāsanaiḥ || RBhrs_4,2.10 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6183: apriyādeḥ kriyā kuryān nālaukiky api vismayam |
GR14ruphbr_u:6184: asādhāraṇy api manāk karoty eva priyasya sā || RBhrs_4,2.12 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6186: ity atra vismaye proktā raty-anugraha-mādhurī || RBhrs_4,2.13 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6196: ālambana iha prokta eṣa eva caturvidhaḥ || RBhrs_4,3.2 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6197: utsāhas tv eṣa bhaktānāṃ sarveṣām eva sambhavet || RBhrs_4,3.3 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6200: sakhā bandhu-viśeṣo vā yuddha-vīra ihocyate || RBhrs_4,3.4 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6201: pratiyoddhā mukundo vā tasmin vā prekṣake sthite |
GR14ruphbr_u:6207: yadi na tvaṃ samarāt parāñcasi || RBhrs_4,3.6 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6212: śrīdāmnaś ca bakī-dviṣaś ca samarāṭopaḥ paṭīyān abhūt || RBhrs_4,3.7 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6215: tathādya laguḍaṃ kramād bhramayati sma dāmā kṛtī |
GR14ruphbr_u:6222: jigāya bharata-śreṣṭhaṃ kuntyāḥ pramukhato vibhuḥ || RBhrs_4,3.10 || iti |
GR14ruphbr_u:6224: pratiyodha-sthitāḥ santo bhavanty uddīpanā iha || RBhrs_4,3.11 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6227: jitvā dāmodara yudhi vṛthā mā kṛthāḥ katthitāni |
GR14ruphbr_u:6229: mandradhvāno naṭati nikaṭe stokakṛṣṇaḥ kalāpī || RBhrs_4,3.12 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6238: divyārgalā pratibhaṭas trapate bhujo me || RBhrs_4,3.15 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6243: sudāmnaḥ sotkaṇṭhaṃ jayati muhur āhopuruṣikā || RBhrs_4,3.16 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6249: jigīṣā stheyasī yuddhe sā yuddhotsāha īryate || RBhrs_4,3.18 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6257: mā tvaṃ bhaiṣīḥ kṣudra re bhadrasena |
GR14ruphbr_u:6264: hareḥ pramadam ekakaḥ samiti bhadraseno vyadhāt || RBhrs_4,3.21 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6273: sāhāyyam atra subalaḥ kurute balī cej
GR14ruphbr_u:6275: suhṛd eva pratibhaṭo vīre kṛṣṇasya na tvariḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:6276: sa bhakta-kṣobha-kāritvād raudre tv ālambano rase |
GR14ruphbr_u:6277: rāgābhāvo dṛg-ādīnāṃ raudrād asya vibhedakaḥ || RBhrs_4,3.24 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6279: dvi-vidho dāna-vīraḥ syād ekas tatra bahu-pradaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:6282: sahasā dīyate yena svayaṃ sarvasvam apy uta |
GR14ruphbr_u:6283: dāmodarasya saukhyāya procyate sa bahu-pradaḥ || RBhrs_4,3.26 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6289: pragāḍhā stheyasī ditsā dānotsāha itīryate || RBhrs_4,3.29 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6290: dvidhā bahu-prado 'py eṣa vidvadbhir iha kathyate |
GR14ruphbr_u:6291: syād ābhyudayikas tv ekaḥ paras tat-sampradānakaḥ || RBhrs_4,3.30 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6294: arthibhyo brāhmaṇādibhyaḥ sa ābhyudāyiko bhavet || RBhrs_4,3.31 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6299: iti nijagadur uccair bhūsurā yena tṛptāḥ || RBhrs_4,3.32 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6302: sarvasvaṃ dīyate yena sa syāt tat-sampradānakaḥ || RBhrs_4,3.33 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6303: tad-dānaṃ prīti-pūjābhyāṃ bhaved ity uditaṃ dvidhā || RBhrs_4,3.34 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6305: prīti-dānaṃ tu tasmai yad dadyād bandhv-ādi-rūpiṇe || RBhrs_4,3.35 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6309: dattvā rājyaṃ kuṭumbaṃ svam api bhagavate ditsur apy anyad uccair
GR14ruphbr_u:6310: deyaṃ kutrāpy adṛṣṭvā makha-sadasi tadā vyākulaḥ pāṇḍavo 'bhūt || RBhrs_4,3.36 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6312: pujā-dānaṃ tu tasmai yad vipra-rūpāya dīyate || RBhrs_4,3.37 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6316: sa eva viṣṇur varado 'stu vā paro
GR14ruphbr_u:6317: dāsyāmy amuṣmai kṣitim īpsitāṃ mune || RBhrs_4,3.38 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6320: balinaiva sa yenāsya bhikṣā-pātrīkṛtaḥ karaḥ || RBhrs_4,3.39 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6323: hariṇā dīyamāno 'pi sārṣṭy-ādis tuṣyatā varaḥ || RBhrs_4,3.40 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6327: atra sañcāritā bhūmnā dhṛter eva samīkṣyate || RBhrs_4,3.42 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6329: tyāgecchā tādṛśī prauḍhā tyāgotsāha itīryate || RBhrs_4,3.43 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6334: svāmin kṛtārtho 'smi varaṃ na yāce || RBhrs_4,3.44 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6337: kiṃ vānyad arpita-bhayaṃ bhruva unnayais te |
GR14ruphbr_u:6341: dhuryādīnāṃ tṛtīyasya vīrasya padavīṃ vrajet || RBhrs_4,3.46 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6347: āśvāsanoktayaḥ sthairyam ity ādyās tatra vikriyāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:6348: autsukyam atiharṣādyā jñeyāḥ sañcāriṇo budhaiḥ || RBhrs_4,3.49 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6352: vande kuṭmalitāñjalir muhur ahaṃ vīraṃ mayūra-dhvajaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:6355: sollāsaṃ krakacena dāritam abhūt patnī-sutābhyāṃ śivaḥ || RBhrs_4,3.51 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6356: hareś cet tattva-vijñānaṃ naivāsya ghaṭate dayā |
GR14ruphbr_u:6357: tad-abhāve tv asau dāna-vīre 'ntar-bhavati sphuṭam || RBhrs_4,3.52 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6359: kṛtātra dvija-rūpe ca bhaktis tenāsya bhaktatā || RBhrs_4,3.53 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6361: vopadevādayo dhīrā vīram ācakṣate tridhā || RBhrs_4,3.54 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6364: prāyeṇa dhīra-śāntas tu dharma-vīraḥ sa ucyate || RBhrs_4,3.55 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6368: dharmaikābhiniveśas tu dharmotsāho mataḥ satām || RBhrs_4,3.57 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6375: dhyātvendrādy-āśrayatvena yad eṣv āhutir arpyate || RBhrs_4,3.59 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6376: ayaṃ tu sākṣāt tasyaiva nideśāt kurute makhān |
GR14ruphbr_u:6379: dharma-vīraṃ na manyante katicid dhanikādayaḥ* || RBhrs_4,3.61 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6386: ātmocitair vibhāvādyair nītā puṣṭiṃ satāṃ hṛdi |
GR14ruphbr_u:6387: bhavec choka-ratir bhakti-raso hi karuṇābhidhaḥ || RBhrs_4,4.1 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6389: aniṣṭāpteḥ padatayā vedyaḥ kṛṣṇo 'sya ca priyaḥ || RBhrs_4,4.2 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6391: ity asya viṣayatvena jñeyā ālambanās tridhā || RBhrs_4,4.3 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6392: tat-tad-vedī ca tad-bhakta āśrayatvena ca tridhā |
GR14ruphbr_u:6401: uktā śoka-ratiḥ saiva sthāyī bhāva ihocyate || RBhrs_4,4.7 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6411: viṣam agatim avasthāṃ goṣṭha-rājasya rājñī || RBhrs_4,4.9 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6414: nīlāmbarasya vaktrendur nīlimānaṃ muhur dadhe || RBhrs_4,4.10 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6419: sa devarṣir muktān api tanu-bhṛtaḥ śocati bhṛśam || RBhrs_4,4.11 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6421: mātar mādri gatā kutas tvam adhunā hā kvāsi pāṇḍo pitaḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:6422: sāndrānanda-sudhābdhir eṣa yuvayor nābhūd dṛśāṃ gocaraḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:6423: ity uccair nakulānujo vilapati prekṣya pramodākulo
GR14ruphbr_u:6425: ratiṃ vināpi ghaṭate hāsyāder udgamaḥ kvacit |
GR14ruphbr_u:6426: kadācid api śokasya nāsya sambhāvanā bhavet || RBhrs_4,4.13 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6427: rater bhūmnā kraśimnā ca śoko bhūyān kṛśaś ca saḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:6428: ratyā sahāvinā-bhāvāt kāpy etasya viśiṣṭatā || RBhrs_4,4.14 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6432: ataḥ prādurbhavan śoko labdhāpy udbhaṭatāṃ muhuḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:6433: durūhām eva tanute gatiṃ saukhyasya kām api || RBhrs_4,4.16 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6441: kṛṣṇo hito 'hitaś ceti krodhasya viṣayas tridhā |
GR14ruphbr_u:6443: bhaktāḥ sarva-vidhā eva hite caivāhite tathā || RBhrs_4,5.2 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6445: sakhī-krodhe bhavet sakhyāḥ kṛṣṇād atyāhite sati || RBhrs_4,5.3 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6447: antaḥ-kleśa-kalaṅkitāḥ kila vayaṃ yāmo 'dya yāmyāṃ purīṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:6450: hā medhāvini rādhike tava kathaṃ premā garīyān abhūt || RBhrs_4,5.4 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6452: krodho jaratyā vadhv-ādi-sambandhe prekṣite harau || RBhrs_4,5.5 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6454: are yuvati-taskara prakaṭam eva vadhvāḥ paṭas
GR14ruphbr_u:6455: tavorasi nirīkṣyate bata na neti kiṃ jalpasi |
GR14ruphbr_u:6456: aho vraja-nivāsinaḥ śṛṇuta kiṃ na vikrośanaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:6459: sarveṣām eva govinde ratiḥ prauḍhā virājate || RBhrs_4,5.7 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6461: hitas tridhānavahitaḥ sāhasī cerṣyur ity api || RBhrs_4,5.8 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6464: kvacit tatra pramatto yaḥ prokto 'navahito 'tra saḥ || RBhrs_4,5.9 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6471: yaḥ prerako bhaya-sthāne sāhasī sa nigadyate || RBhrs_4,5.11 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6485: ahitaḥ syād dvidhā svasya hareś ceti prabhedataḥ || RBhrs_4,5.15 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6487: ahitaḥ svasya sa syād yaḥ kṛṣṇa-sambandha-bādhakaḥ || RBhrs_4,5.16 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6491: iti uttuṅgā mama madhu-pure yātrayā tatra tāsāṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:6494: ahitas tu hares tasya vairi-pakṣo nigadyate || RBhrs_4,5.18 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6499: trir asya mukuṭopari sphuṭam udīrya savyaṃ padam || RBhrs_4,5.19 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6501: kṛṣṇāhita-hitasthāḥ syur amī uddīpanā iha || RBhrs_4,5.20 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6507: atra stambhādayaḥ sarve prākaṭyaṃ yānti sāttvikāḥ || RBhrs_4,5.23 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6510: atra krodha-ratiḥ sthāyī sa tu krodhas tridhā mataḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:6511: kopo manyus tathā roṣas tatra kopas tu śatru-gaḥ || RBhrs_4,5.25 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6513: roṣas tu dayite strīṇām ato vyabhicaraty asau || RBhrs_4,5.26 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6515: dṛg-anta-pāṭalatvādyā roṣe tu kathitāḥ kriyāḥ || RBhrs_4,5.27 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6518: mṛdhe magadha-bhūpatau kim api vaktram ākrośati |
GR14ruphbr_u:6521: {*Three syllables missing in the last line. Copyist error or typo?}
GR14ruphbr_u:6523: krośantyāṃ kara-pallavena balavān sadyaḥ pidhatte mukhaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:6524: dhāvantyāṃ bhaya-bhāji vistṛta-bhujo rundhe puraḥ paddhatim |
GR14ruphbr_u:6525: pādānte viluṭhaty asau mayi muhur daṣṭādharāyāṃ ruṣā
GR14ruphbr_u:6526: mātaś caṇḍi mayā śikhaṇḍa-mukuṭād ātmābhirakṣyaḥ katham || RBhrs_4,5.29 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6529: tava girā jaṭile niṭile ca me |
GR14ruphbr_u:6536: kuṭena māṃ tad api vañcayate vadhūṭī || RBhrs_4,5.31 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6537: asmin na tādṛśo manyau vartate raty-anugrahaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:6540: krodho rati-vinābhāvān na bhakti-rasatāṃ vrajet || RBhrs_4,5.33 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6549: kṛṣṇaś ca dāruṇāś ceti tasminn ālambanā dvidhā |
GR14ruphbr_u:6550: anukampyeṣu sāgassu kṛṣṇas tasya ca bandhuṣu || RBhrs_4,6.2 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6552: darśanāc chravaṇāc ceti smaraṇāc ca prakīrtitāḥ || RBhrs_4,6.3 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6554: kiṃ śuṣyad-vadano 'pi muñca khacitaṃ citte pṛthuṃ vepathuṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:6555: viśvasya prakṛtiṃ bhajasva na manāg apy asti mantuṃ tava |
GR14ruphbr_u:6556: uṣma-mrakṣitam ṛkṣa-rāja rabhasād vistīrya vīryaṃ tvayā
GR14ruphbr_u:6557: pṛthvī pratyuta yuddha-kautuka-mayī sevaiva me nirmitā || RBhrs_4,6.4 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6559: mura-mathana puras te ko bhujaṅgas tapasvī
GR14ruphbr_u:6560: laghu-haram iti kārṣīr mā sma dīnāya manyum |
GR14ruphbr_u:6562: aśaraṇam atimūḍhaṃ rakṣa rakṣa prasīda || RBhrs_4,6.5 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6577: vapur atipuruṣaṃ yā ghoram āviścakāra || RBhrs_4,6.8 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6581: krośanādyāḥ kriyāś cātra sāttvikāś cāśru-varjitāḥ || RBhrs_4,6.10 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6584: asmin bhagna-ratiḥ sthāyī bhāvaḥ syād aparādhataḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:6585: bhīṣaṇebhyaś ca tatra syād bahudhaivāparādhitā || RBhrs_4,6.12 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6586: taj-jā bhīr nāparatra syād anugrāhya-janān vinā |
GR14ruphbr_u:6587: ākṛtyā ye prakṛtyā ye ye prabhāveṇa bhīṣaṇāḥ || RBhrs_4,6.13 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6592: sadā bhagavato bhītiṃ gatā ātyantikīm api |
GR14ruphbr_u:6593: kaṃsādyā rati-śūnyatvād atra nālambanā matāḥ || RBhrs_4,6.16 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6601: asau bhakti-raso dhīrair bībhatsākhya itīryate || RBhrs_4,7.1 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6602: asminn āśrita-śāntādyā dhīrair ālambanā matāḥ || RBhrs_4,7.2 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6606: citraṃ so 'yam udīrayan hari-guṇān udbāṣpa-dṛṣṭir jano
GR14ruphbr_u:6607: dṛṣṭe strī-vadane vikūṇita-mukho viṣṭabhya niṣṭhīvati || RBhrs_4,7.3 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6612: jugupsā-ratir atra syāt sthāyī sā ca vivekajā |
GR14ruphbr_u:6613: prāyikī ceti kathitā jugupsā dvi-vidhā budhaiḥ || RBhrs_4,7.6 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6616: vivekotthā tu dehādau jugupsā syād vivekajā || RBhrs_4,7.7 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6621: bhagavati hanta rater lave 'py udīrṇe || RBhrs_4,7.8 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6624: yā prāyo jāyate seyaṃ jugupsā prāyikī matā || RBhrs_4,7.9 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6627: vasann eṣa klinno jaḍa-tanur ahaṃ mātur udare |
GR14ruphbr_u:6629: tad asmin kaṃsāre kuru mayi kṛpā-sāgara kṛpām || RBhrs_4,7.10 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6634: kṣiptās te smṛtim ākalayya naraka-dhvaṃsinn iha prāṇimaḥ || RBhrs_4,7.11 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6635: labdha-kṛṣṇa-rater eva suṣṭhu pūtaṃ manaḥ sadā |
GR14ruphbr_u:6636: kṣubhyaty ahṛdy aleśe 'pi tato 'syāṃ raty-anugrahaḥ || RBhrs_4,7.12 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6638: prācāṃ matānusāreṇa tad vijñeyaṃ manīṣibhiḥ || RBhrs_4,7.13 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6639: amī pañcaiva śāntādyā harer bhakti-rasā matāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:6640: eṣu hāsyādayaḥ prāyo bibhrati vyabhicāritām || RBhrs_4,7.14 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6648: mitratvaṃ śātravatvaṃ ca rasānām abhidhīyate || RBhrs_4,8.1 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6650: adbhutaś caiṣa prītādiṣu catuḥṣv api || RBhrs_4,8.2 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6651: dviṣann asya śucir yuddhavīro raudro bhayānakaḥ || RBhrs_4,8.3 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6653: vairī śucir yuddha-vīro raudraś caika-vibhāvakaḥ || RBhrs_4,8.4 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6654: preyasas tu śucir hāsyo yuddha-vīraḥ suhṛd-varāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:6655: dviṣo vatsala-bībhatsa-raudrā bhīṣmaś ca pūrvavat || RBhrs_4,8.5 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6657: śatruḥ śucir yuddha-vīraḥ prīto raudraś ca pūrvavat || RBhrs_4,8.6 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6658: śucer hāsyas tathā preyān suhṛd asya prakīrtitaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:6660: prāhur eke 'sya suhṛdaṃ vīra-yugmaṃ pare ripum || RBhrs_4,8.7 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6661: mitraṃ hāsyasya bībhatsaḥ śuciḥ preyān savatsalaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:6662: pratipakṣas tu karuṇas tathā prokto bhayānakaḥ || RBhrs_4,8.8 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6663: adbhutasya suhṛd vīraḥ pañca śāntādayas tathā |
GR14ruphbr_u:6664: pratipakṣo bhaved asya raudro bībhatsa eva ca || RBhrs_4,8.9 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6665: vīrasya tv adbhuto hāsyaḥ preyān prītis tathā suhṛt |
GR14ruphbr_u:6666: bhayānako vipakṣo 'sya kasyacic chānta eva ca || RBhrs_4,8.10 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6668: vairī hāsyo 'sya sambhoga-śṛṅgāraś cādbhutas tathā || RBhrs_4,8.11 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6669: raudrasya karuṇaḥ prokto vīraś cāpi suhṛd-varaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:6670: pratipakṣas tu hāsye 'sya śṛṅgāro bhīṣaṇo 'pi ca || RBhrs_4,8.12 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6673: bībhatsasya bhavec chānto hāsyaḥ prītis tathā suhṛt |
GR14ruphbr_u:6674: śatruḥ śucis tathā preyān jñeyā yuktyā pare ca te || RBhrs_4,8.14 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6676: kathitebhyaḥ pare ye syus te taṭasthāḥ satāṃ matāḥ || RBhrs_4,8.15 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6677: suhṛdā miśraṇāṃ samyag āsvādaṃ kurute rasam || RBhrs_4,8.16 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6678: dvayos tu miśraṇe sāmyaṃ duḥśakaṃ syāt tulā-dhṛtam |
GR14ruphbr_u:6679: tasmād aṅgāṅgi-bhāvena melanaṃ viduṣāṃ matam || RBhrs_4,8.17 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6680: bhaven mukhyo 'tha vā gauṇo raso 'ṅgī kila yatra yaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:6681: kartavyaṃ tatra tasyāṅgaṃ suhṛd eva raso budhaiḥ || RBhrs_4,8.18 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6683: aṅgatāṃ yatra suhṛdo mukhyā gauṇāś ca bibhrati || RBhrs_4,8.19 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6686: tasya padāmbuja-yugalaṃ kiṃ vā saṃvāhayiṣyāmi || RBhrs_4,8.20 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6699: atra mukhya eva mukhyasya gauṇayoś ca |
GR14ruphbr_u:6708: yas tu dṛṣṭyā padminīnām api suṣṭhu hṛṇīyate || RBhrs_4,8.24 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6712: na tṛpyati na sarvataḥ sukha-maye samādhāv api |
GR14ruphbr_u:6713: na siddhiṣu ca lālasāṃ vahati labhyamānāsv api
GR14ruphbr_u:6714: prabho tava padārcane param upaiti tṛṣṇāṃ manaḥ || RBhrs_4,8.25 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6718: adharaṃ piñcha-cūḍasya calāś culūkayanti yāḥ || RBhrs_4,8.26 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6721: dṛśos taralitair alaṃ vraja nivṛtya mugdhe vrajaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:6722: vitarkayasi māṃ yathā na hi tathāsmi kiṃ bhūriṇā |
GR14ruphbr_u:6734: vatsān avati vatso me hanta santapyate manaḥ || RBhrs_4,8.29 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6737: putras te navanīta-piṇḍam atanuṃ muṣṇan mamāntar-gṛhād
GR14ruphbr_u:6739: ity uktā kula-vṛddhayā suta-mukhe dṛṣṭiṃ vibhugna-bhruṇi
GR14ruphbr_u:6740: smerāṃ nikṣipatī sadā bhavatu vaḥ kṣemāya goṣṭheśvarī || RBhrs_4,8.30 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6748: kevale vatsale nāsti mukhyasya khalu sauhṛdam |
GR14ruphbr_u:6749: ato 'tra vatsale tasya natarāṃ likhitāṅgatā || RBhrs_4,8.32 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6754: sandeśam arpayati tanvi mad-artham eva || RBhrs_4,8.33 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6757: svasāsmi tava nirdaye paricinoṣi na tvaṃ kutaḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:6760: kṛtaṃ smitam abhijñayā guru-puras tadā rādhayā || RBhrs_4,8.34 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6764: smara-smerām ārād dṛśam asakalām arpayati ca |
GR14ruphbr_u:6765: bhujām aṃse sakhyuḥ pulakini dadhānaḥ phani-nibhām
GR14ruphbr_u:6770: tenaiṣām aṅgitā vyaktā mukhyānāṃ ca tathāṅgatā |
GR14ruphbr_u:6771: tathāpy alpa-viśeṣāya kiñcid eva vilikhyate || RBhrs_4,8.36 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6780: māṃ yoddhuṃ milasi puraḥ kathaṃ viśāla |
GR14ruphbr_u:6782: śrīdāmā gaṇayati re tvam atra ko 'si || RBhrs_4,8.38 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6792: yaṣṭyā durbalayā vijitya purataḥ solluṇṭham udgāyataḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:6794: kṛṣṇaḥ phulla-kapolakaḥ pulakavān visphāra-dṛṣṭir babhau || RBhrs_4,8.40 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6796: evam anyasya gauṇasya jñeyā kavibhir aṅgitā |
GR14ruphbr_u:6797: tathā ca mukhya-gauṇānāṃ rasānām aṅgatāpi ca || RBhrs_4,8.41 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6798: so 'ṅgī sarvātigo yaḥ syān mukhyo gauṇo 'thavā rasaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:6799: sa evāṅgaṃ bhaved aṅgi-poṣī sañcāritāṃ vrajan || RBhrs_4,8.42 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6801: eka eva bhavet sthāyī raso mukhyatamo hi yaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:6802: rasās tad-anuyāyitvād anye syur vyabhicāriṇaḥ || RBhrs_4,8.43 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6804: rasānāṃ samavetānāṃ yasya rūpaṃ bhaved bahu |
GR14ruphbr_u:6805: sa mantavyo rasaḥ sthāyī śeṣāḥ saṅcāriṇo matāḥ || RBhrs_4,8.44 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6807: puṣṇan nija-prabhuṃ mukhyaṃ gauṇas tatraiva līyate || RBhrs_4,8.45 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6809: kuñcatā nija-nāthena gauṇo 'py aṅgitvam aśnute || RBhrs_4,8.46 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6810: mukhyas tv aṅgatvam āsādya puṣṇann indram upendravat |
GR14ruphbr_u:6813: bhāty eva na tu līnaḥ syād eṣa sañcāri-gauṇavat || RBhrs_4,8.48 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6814: aṅgī mukhyaḥ svam atrāṅgair bhāvais tair abhivardhayan |
GR14ruphbr_u:6815: sajātīyair vijātīyaiḥ svatantraḥ san virājate || RBhrs_4,8.49 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6816: yasya mukhyasya yo bhakto bhaven nitya-nijāśrayaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:6817: aṅgī sa eva tatra syān mukhyo 'py anyo 'ṅgatāṃ vrajet || RBhrs_4,8.50 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6820: tad vinā tasya sampāto vaiphalyāyaiva kalpate || RBhrs_4,8.51 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6824: janayaty eva vairasyaṃ rasānāṃ vairiṇā yutiḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:6838: śiraḥ kṛṣṇa tavāghrāya vihariṣye tatas tvayā || RBhrs_4,8.56 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6846: adyaiva dūti tena tvaṃ mayā ramaya mādhavam || RBhrs_4,8.58 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6848: ciraṃ jīveti saṃyujya kācid āśīrbhir acyutam |
GR14ruphbr_u:6852: kvacid bhavet tataḥ suṣṭhu vairasyāyaiva kalpate || RBhrs_4,8.60 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6860: smaryamāṇatayāpy uktau sāmyena vacane 'pi ca || RBhrs_4,8.63 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6863: ity ādiṣu na vairasyaṃ vairiṇo janayed yutiḥ || RBhrs_4,8.64 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6864: tatra ekatarasya bādhyatvena varṇane, yathā vidagdha-mādhave (2.18)--
GR14ruphbr_u:6865: pratyāhṛtya muniḥ kṣaṇaṃ viṣayato yasmin mano dhitsate
GR14ruphbr_u:6866: bālāsau viṣayeṣu dhitsati tataḥ pratyāharantī manaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:6867: yasya sphūrti-lavāya hanta hṛdaye yogī sumutkaṇṭhate
GR14ruphbr_u:6868: mugdheyaṃ kila tasya paśya hṛdayān niṣkrāntim ākāṅkṣati || RBhrs_4,8.65 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6869: bādhyatvam atra śāntasya śucer utkarṣa-varṇanāt || RBhrs_4,8.66 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6877: sukhātmā bhavatī rādhe brahma-vidyeva rājate || RBhrs_4,8.68 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6879: rādhā śāntir ivonnidraṃ nirnimeṣekṣaṇaṃ ca mām |
GR14ruphbr_u:6880: kurvatī dhyāna-lagnaṃ ca vāsayaty adri-kandare || RBhrs_4,8.69 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6891: yā te padābja-makarandam ajighratī strī || RBhrs_4,8.71 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6894: tatrāsmākaṃ yad-avadhi sakhe dṛṣṭir eṣā niviṣṭā |
GR14ruphbr_u:6895: satyaṃ brūmas tad-avadhi bhaved indum indīvaraṃ ca
GR14ruphbr_u:6905: saṅgatiḥ kila mukhyasya vairasyāyaiva jāyate || RBhrs_4,8.74 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6908: yāmi kāśya-gṛhaṃ yūnā manaḥ śyāmena me hṛtam || RBhrs_4,8.75 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6912: sadānandaṃ paraṃ brahma dṛṣṭyā seviṣyate mayā || RBhrs_4,8.76 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6918: aṅgayor aṅginaḥ puṣṭyai bhaved ekatra saṅgatiḥ || RBhrs_4,8.78 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6921: gariṣṭho 'yaṃ keśī girivad iti me vellati manaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:6923: khalaṃ kṣundan kuryāṃ vrajam atitarāṃ śālinam aham || RBhrs_4,8.79 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6926: kamprā svedini cūrṇa-kuntala-taṭe ity ādi (BRS 4.8.31) || RBhrs_4,8.80 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6929: mitho vairāv api dvau yau bhāvau dharma-sutādiṣu |
GR14ruphbr_u:6930: kālādi-bhedat prākaṭyaṃ tau vindantau na duṣyataḥ || RBhrs_4,8.81 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6932: na syād ity ujjvale rādhā-kṛṣṇayor darśitaṃ purā || RBhrs_4,8.82 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6936: daityācāryās tad-āsye vikṛtim aruṇatāṃ malla-varyāḥ sakhāyo
GR14ruphbr_u:6937: gaṇḍaunnatyaṃ khaleśāḥ pralayam ṛṣigaṇā dhyāna-muṣṇāsram ambāḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:6938: romāñcaṃ sāṃyugīnāḥ kam api nava-camatkāram antaḥ sureśā
GR14ruphbr_u:6939: lāsyaṃ dāsāḥ kaṭākṣaṃ yayur asita-dṛśaḥ prekṣya raṅge mukundam || RBhrs_4,8.84 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6941: svasmin dhūrye 'py amānī śiśuṣu gari-dhṛtāv udyateṣu smitāsyas
GR14ruphbr_u:6942: thūtkārī dadhni visre praṇayiṣu vivṛta-prauḍhir indre 'ruṇākṣaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:6943: goṣṭhe sāśrur vidūne guruṣu hari-makhaṃ prāsya kampaḥ sa pāyād
GR14ruphbr_u:6944: āsāre sphāra-dṛṣṭir yuvatiṣu pulakī bibhrad adriṃ vibhur vaḥ || RBhrs_4,8.85 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6951: rasā eva rasābhāsā rasa-jñair anukīrtitāḥ || RBhrs_4,9.1 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6952: syus tridhoparasāś cānu-rasāś cāparasāś ca te |
GR14ruphbr_u:6953: uttamā madhyamāḥ proktāḥ kaniṣṭhāś cety amī kramāt || RBhrs_4,9.2 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6956: śāntādayo rasā eva dvādaśoparasā matāḥ || RBhrs_4,9.3 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6959: tathā bībhatsa-bhūmādeḥ śānto hy uparaso bhavet || RBhrs_4,9.4 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6962: sukhaṃ dṛṣṭe tad evādya purāṇa-puruṣe tvayi || RBhrs_4,9.5 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6967: tvāṃ vinā kim api nāparam asti || RBhrs_4,9.6 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:6994: dvayor ekatarasyaiva ratir yā khalu dṛśyate |
GR14ruphbr_u:6995: yān ekatra tathaikasya sthāyinaḥ sā virūpatā |
GR14ruphbr_u:7001: ahnāya kāpi gaitri aṅkuritām ayāsīt || RBhrs_4,9.14 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:7003: etasyāḥ prāg-abhāve tu śucir noparaso bhavet || RBhrs_4,9.15 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:7010: nāyikāsv apy anekāsu vadanty uparasaṃ śucim || RBhrs_4,9.17 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:7013: latā-paśu-pulindīṣu vṛddhāsv api sa vartate || RBhrs_4,9.18 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:7018: ratim iha pallavitāṃ hṛdi vyanakti || RBhrs_4,9.19 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:7026: harer dṛk-cāpalaṃ vīkṣya sahajaṃ yā vighūrṇate || RBhrs_4,9.21 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:7045: kailāsa-vāsinīṃ dāsīṃ kṛpā-dṛṣṭyā bhajasva mām || RBhrs_4,9.27 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:7048: kaṭī-kaṇḍūtir ity ādyaṃ grāmyatvaṃ kathitaṃ budhaiḥ || RBhrs_4,9.28 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:7050: kiṃ naḥ phaṇi-kiśorīṇāṃ tvaṃ puṣkara-sadāṃ sadā |
GR14ruphbr_u:7053: prakaṭa-prārthanādiḥ syāt sambhogādes tu dhṛṣṭatā || RBhrs_4,9.30 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:7056: tvaṃ vidagdho 'si govinda kiṃ vā vācyam ataḥ param || RBhrs_4,9.31 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:7057: evam eva tu gauṇānāṃ hāsādīnām api svayam |
GR14ruphbr_u:7061: rasā hāsyādayaḥ sapta śāntaś cānurasā matāḥ || RBhrs_4,9.33 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:7072: evam evātra vijñeyā vīrāder apy udāhṛtiḥ || RBhrs_4,9.36 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:7073: aṣṭāv amī taṭastheṣu prākaṭyaṃ yadi bibhrati |
GR14ruphbr_u:7077: hāsādīnāṃ tadā te 'tra prājñair aparasā matāḥ || RBhrs_4,9.38 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:7080: kṛṣṇam ārāj jarāsandhaḥ solluṇṭham ahasīn muhuḥ || RBhrs_4,9.39 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:7082: uttamās tu rasābhāsāḥ kaiścid rasatayoditāḥ || RBhrs_4,9.40 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:7084: bhāvāḥ sarve tad-ābhāsā rasābhāsāś ca kecana |
GR14ruphbr_u:7085: amī prokta-rasābhijñaiḥ sarve 'pi rasanād rasāḥ || RBhrs_4,9.41 ||
GR14ruphbr_u:7094: iti śrī-śrī-bhakti-rasāmṛta-sindhau gauṇa-bhakti-rasa-nirūpaṇo nāma caturtho vibhāgaḥ samāptaḥ |
GR14ruphbr_u:7098: Thank you for using a Gaudiya Grantha Mandir text. Remember, GGM is an open source network.
GR14ruphbr_u:7100: give back to the world community of scholars by notifying us of any mistakes or variant readings,
GR14ruphbr_u:7101: either by emailing us directly or by posting in the GGM forums. And if you are working closely on this or any other text,
GR14ruphbr_u:7102: please send us your edited version.
GR14ruphbr_u:7103: And, if you can, please help by donating to the cause.
GR14ruphbr_u:7104: The work done here will last for generations.
